*The Supreme Cavernous Mystery Numinous Treasure Scripture of the Inner Sounds of the Various Heavens, Spontaneously Manifested in Jade Characters*

**Scripture Title:** *The Supreme Cavernous Mystery Numinous Treasure Scripture of the Inner Sounds of the Various Heavens, Spontaneously Manifested in Jade Characters*. Author unknown, approximately composed during the Eastern Jin dynasty. One of the ancient *Scriptures of the Numinous Treasure*. Originally in two scrolls, later divided into four. Base text from the *Daoist Canon of the Zhengtong Era*, *Cavernous Truth* section, *Jade Instructions* category. Collated with the Dunhuang manuscript fragment P.2431.

---

**Scroll One of *The Supreme Cavernous Mystery Numinous Treasure Scripture of the Inner Sounds of the Various Heavens, Spontaneously Manifested in Jade Characters***

### *The Jade Instructions of the Great Brahma’s Hidden Language and the Infinite Cavernous Chapters*

The Heavenly Perfected Sovereign declared: *"The Jade Characters of the Heavenly Scripture"* condense the soaring mystery of *qi* to form numinous script, unite the Eight Assemblies to compose sound, and harmonize the Five Convergences to complete its chapters. When the great cosmic cycle commences, jade-like tones arise of themselves; divine winds play in emptiness, and the *shao* melodies resound through the caverns. They shine brilliantly above the various heavens, illuminating the depths of the Great Obscurity, evolving in unison with the Dragon Han era and unfolding the Crimson Clarity of the Yan Kang epoch. They refine water and fire within life and death, enduring through kalpas without end, opening the Eight Enclosures at the hidden pivot and planting the numinous radiance within the Great Yang. The Two Modes uphold them to divide [heaven and earth], and the Three Luminaries sustain them to distinguish [time and space]. The exalted sages ride them to ascend in glory; the Five Peaks treasure them for their numinosity. All things attain life through them, and the fortunes of states enjoy peace by their virtue. Vast and boundless is their great model, lofty and revered their supreme dignity. From being arises non-being, and they are the root of heaven and earth. Those who attain them do not die; those who venerate them endure forever. Those who treasure them receive the descent of the Perfected; those who cultivate them become immortals. They deliver the dead from eternal night and refine the living souls in the Vermilion Palace. The wondrous transformative script emerges from spontaneity—blended, it is not turbid; clarified, it is not pure; destroyed, it is not extinguished; extinguished, it revives again. Towering and transcendent above the Great Void, they are the ancestral origin of the myriad emperors. Their majestic numen is vast and boundless, beyond all naming.

**Year of the Great Year-Star [Tai Sui], [specific] month, [specific] jiazi day as the new moon, [specific] jiazi day as the appointed day:**

The Perfected of [specific] Sacred Peak, whose natal destiny is [specific], born in the [specific] jiazi month, and whose celestial register is under the jurisdiction of the Qi Sovereign of [specific] Qi Heaven, now in [specific] Qi Heaven, receives the scriptural talisman from Master [specific], the Daoist of [specific] Sacred Peak, to wear upon the body. With the Seven Treasures sealing the spirit, golden silk pledging the heart, and a covenant sworn before the numinous heavens, this talisman is bound as the body’s treasure. Reverently upholding the Great Law, adhering to ancient canons, and petitioning the overseers of the Thirty-Two Heavens—those who monitor the scriptural decrees of salvation, the Attendant Immortal Gentlemen of the Scriptures, Han the Controller of Records, the Flying Heaven Perfected, and the Divine Kings of the Three Realms—[the initiate’s] name is stricken from the register of mortal death and inscribed upon the golden tablets and jade registers of the Three Primordials. In accordance with the majestic rites of the Great Enclosure, the qi of the true immortals descends and enters the initiate’s body.

The Supervisory Immortal Marshals of the Thirty-Two Heavens and the Feathered Gentlemen of the Scriptures, each according to their register, dispatch the qi of jade lads and jade maidens—one portion each—to attend and guard the numinous scripture, bestowing it upon the initiate’s body. This universally binds all heavens, all earths, and the boundless worlds; the sun, moon, and stellar lodges; the officials of the Three Realms; the Five Sacred Peaks, famous mountains, and the water palaces of the Nine Rivers; the Three Officials who mete out punishments; and the spirits of the Nine Darks, the Long Night, and the Yellow Springs—those without shadow or form, without name or sound, without size or stature, without rank or station—all shall clearly recognize that the initiate upholds the Great Law, bears the celestial scripture upon the body, and has a name inscribed in the registers of the Three Primordials. In all goings and comings, they shall attend and welcome as before, thrice daily, as in the Purple Tenuity’s Upper Palace. The earthly writs of the Nine Darks are expunged, the roots of past transgressions severed, and evil affinities gradually dissolved. No restraint or arrest shall befall the initiate; through countless kalpas, no entanglement shall arise. Seven generations of ancestors shall share in this blessing, all ascending to roam freely in the Seven-Treasured Grove of the Mysterious Capital, where souls undergo refinement and salvation, and in due time, attain rebirth.

The initiate pledges to uphold the Great Law, ever mindful of the Perfected’s scrutiny, vigilant in sincerity, to achieve immortality in life and death, befriend the Five Emperors, and wander playfully through the heavens. Should the covenant be broken, the celestial scriptures divulged, or transmission occur outside the proper time, the consequences of life and death shall be faced, and the debt to the River Source shall endure eternally. For ten thousand kalpas, the Wind Blade shall strike nightly upon the mountains. Recompense for transgressions and blessings shall be meted out precisely as sworn in the covenant.

The Heavenly Perfected Sovereign declares: Upon receiving the *Innate Jade Characters of the Inner Sounds of All Heavens*, one must adhere to the canonical standards of the Illuminated Perfected. Inscribe in vermilion upon white silk, present the Seven Treasures, seal the spirit with golden silk, and offer a yellow-silk memorial with reverent devotion. Proclaim the salvific scripture of the heavens, exposing it upon the central altar for three days and nights, unmarred by wind or rain, the scripture undisturbed. Only then may it be transmitted in accordance with the Perfected.

**The Jade Formulae of the Innate Jade Characters of the Inner Sounds of All Heavens, the Great Brahmā Concealed Speech, the Ineffable Cavern Scriptures**

**1. The Jade Formula of the Sounds of the Supreme Yellow Sovereign Zeng Heaven**
*The Eightfold Script of the Eastern Nine Qi Azure Heaven*

Within the Sovereign Zeng Heaven, the first, second, and third characters are inscribed facing upward upon the Long Tower of the Mysterious Capital. These scriptures regulate the measurements of heaven and earth and summon the great deities and true beings of the ten directions. The fourth and fifth characters are inscribed upon the southern pavilion of the Emperor Lord’s Wandering Terrace, governing the spontaneous generation of true beings within the Void. The sixth, seventh, and eighth characters are inscribed upon the gates of the sun and moon, governing the illumination of the Nine Darks and the opening of the Long Night’s repository. Each character measures one *zhang* square, resplendent with eight luminous corners, within the Sovereign Zeng Heaven.

The Heavenly Perfected Sovereign declares: To cultivate the Way of Flying Immortality, on the tenth-day fast of each month, inscribe in vermilion the first, second, and third characters of the Sovereign Zeng Heaven, face the direction of the King’s attire, and recite the incantation as prescribed. After a hundred days, ten thousand spirits shall pay homage to the self. On the fifteenth and thirtieth days of the month, inscribe in vermilion the fourth and fifth characters, face east, and consume them while reciting the incantation as prescribed. After twenty-four years of this practice, true beings shall be born within, and in life and death, one shall ascend to the Emperor Lord’s Wandering Terrace. On the days of the waxing and waning moon, inscribe in vermilion the sixth, seventh, and eighth characters, face the moon, and consume them for eight years. Light shall emanate from within, the face shall turn golden, and in life and death, one shall ascend to the halls of the sun and moon, undergo refinement, and achieve immortality. Bearing this scripture, the Three Officials shall no longer record transgressions; the name shall be inscribed in the Sovereign Zeng Heaven, and through the cycles of life and death, one shall endure for countless kalpas. Its method is wondrous and profound, its merit equal to that of the Flying Heavens.

**2. The Jade Formula of the Sounds of the Supreme Bright Jade Complete Heaven**

Within the Jade Complete Heaven, the first and second characters are inscribed together upon the northwestern jade gate-tower, governing the epochs of heaven and earth’s kalpas. The third and fourth characters are inscribed upon the jade fan of the Three Realms’ gate, governing the initial division of measurements. The fifth and sixth characters are inscribed upon the Upper Palace of the Purple Tenuity, governing the realm of retribution and the gate of life and death. The seventh and eighth characters are inscribed within the Northern Primordial Mysterious Dipper, governing the regulation of the celestial pivots and the revolutions of the Wheel of Heaven. Each celestial script measures one *zhang* square, resplendent with eight luminous corners, within the Jade Complete Heaven.

The Heavenly Perfected Sovereign declares: To cultivate the Way of Flying Immortality, on the days of *wuchen* and *wuxu*, inscribe in vermilion the first and second characters of the Jade Complete Heaven, face the northwest, and consume them while reciting the incantation as prescribed. One shall thereby follow the cycles of life and death, transforming through kalpas, and the rank shall equal that of the Flying Heavens. On the day of one’s natal destiny, inscribe in vermilion the third and fourth characters, face the direction of one’s natal destiny, and consume them while reciting the incantation as prescribed. After a hundred days, the Earth Official shall expunge the register of death, the Three Realms shall safeguard the immortal, and in life and death, one shall ascend directly through the Three Convenient Gates. Furthermore, on the day of *jiazi*, inscribe in vermilion the fifth and sixth characters, face north, and consume them while reciting the incantation as above. After a hundred days, the Three Officials shall strike the name from the ledgers of transgressions, inscribe it in the celestial registers, and for the souls in the Office of Destiny’s dark records, the gates of the Long Night shall open, granting salvation and rebirth in the Hall of Blessings and Virtue.

Moreover, on the days of *Lichun* and the Autumn Equinox, inscribe in vermilion the seventh and eighth characters, face the *Wang* direction, and consume them while reciting the incantation as prescribed. After seven years, the Mysterious Dipper shall record the name, and one shall be ranked among the immortals of the Imperial Dawn, while the seven ancestors shall all ascend in the chariot of dark feathers to the Jade Dawn Palace. Those who bear this script shall find no lingering souls in the Nine Darks, nor shall the roots of the Eight Difficulties persist in the Long Night. In life and death, all shall receive deliverance, roaming freely in the Seven Jeweled Grove of the Mysterious Terrace.

**Qingming Hetong Heavenly Sound Jade Formula, Third Section**
The first and second characters of *Hetong Heaven’s Center* are inscribed upon the Golden Flower Upper Palace, governing the roots of merit and transgression in the ledgers of life and death. The third and fourth characters are inscribed upon the Seven Jeweled Mysterious Terrace of Jade Capital, presiding over the rites of the myriad immortals’ audience. The fifth and sixth characters are inscribed upon the Nine Numinous Hall, governing the great cycles of Heaven and Earth’s renewal, opening the Mysterious Feminine of transformation, and spreading the merit of boundless deliverance. The seventh and eighth characters are inscribed above the Northern Origin Mysterious Pass. They command the rise and fall of Heaven and Earth’s *qi*, and the celestial script spans a *zhang* in all directions, its eight corners radiant in *Hetong Heaven’s Center*.

The Perfected Sovereign of Heavenly Truth said: To cultivate the Way of Flying Immortality, on the seventh day of the seventh month, inscribe in vermilion the first and second characters of *Hetong Heaven’s Center*, face south, and consume them while reciting the incantation as prescribed. After a hundred days, the Nine Bureaus shall expunge transgressions from the Earthly Registers, and the Mysterious Capital shall record life in the Golden Script. The dead shall then be delivered from the Nine Darks, and their souls shall ascend to the Southern Culmen Palace. Furthermore, on the days of the Eight Festivals, inscribe in vermilion the third and fourth characters, face north, and consume them for a hundred days. The divine immortals of the Three Realms shall come to pay homage to one’s form, and in life and death, one shall roam freely in the Seven Jeweled Grove. Moreover, on the days of *wuxu* and *wuchen*, inscribe in vermilion the fifth, sixth, seventh, and eighth characters, face the northwest, and consume them. All calamities of the Great Cycle shall be averted, one shall pass through the perils of water and fire, and in accordance with destiny, be reborn in the Beginning Azure Heaven.

**Xuantai Pingyu Heavenly Sound Jade Formula, Fourth Section**
The first, second, third, and fourth characters of *Pingyu Heaven’s Center* are jointly inscribed upon the Gate of Azure Radiance in the Supreme Ultimate Upper Palace, governing the chanting of the Five Harmonies by the jade maidens and the host of perfected ones. The fifth and sixth characters are inscribed upon the Grotto Origin Terrace, governing the radiance of the celebratory clouds in Heaven’s Center and composing the harmonious chapters of the Eight Sounds. The seventh and eighth characters are inscribed upon the Grotto Numinous Upper Hall, governing the imperial lords’ excursions to the Eight Poles, subduing the lords of heavenly demons, and delivering perfected persons. The celestial script spans a *zhang* in all directions, its eight corners radiant in *Pingyu Heaven’s Center*.

The Perfected Sovereign of Heavenly Truth said: To cultivate the Way of Flying Immortality, on the days of the Eight Festivals and *jiazi*, inscribe in vermilion the first four characters, face the *Wang* direction, and consume them. After a hundred days, jade maidens shall play in one’s chamber, their chanting moving the heavens, and they shall descend to summon emperors and kings. Furthermore, on the two days of the spring and autumn equinoxes, inscribe in vermilion the fifth and sixth characters, gaze upward to the white clouds, and consume them. After a hundred days, one’s face shall shine with jade light, and immortals shall commune with one. Moreover, on days of purification, inscribe in vermilion the seventh and eighth characters, face the *Wang* direction, and consume them. After twenty-four years, one shall ascend in both life and death, roam the Eight Poles, transform in the Eight Directions, and wander freely in the Seven Jeweled Grove of the Mysterious Capital.

**Yuanming Wenju Heavenly Sound Jade Formula, Fifth Section**
The first, second, third, and fourth characters of *Wenju Heaven’s Center* are inscribed upon the Three Convenient Gates of Heaven, governing the *qi* of Heaven’s Origin numbers, opening the Pass of Great Possession, and communicating with the perfected ones of Dragon Han. The fifth and sixth characters are inscribed upon the Terrace of Fusion and Life. This Terrace of Fusion and Life is the excursion terrace of the Upper Origin of the Southern Culmen, governing the perfected ones and jade maidens as they scatter the incense of the Five Harmonies to disseminate the celestial script. The seventh and eighth characters are inscribed upon the Purple Yang Hall, governing the *qi* of numinous winds and the swift conveyance of celebratory clouds. The celestial script spans a *zhang* in all directions, its eight corners radiant in *Wenju Heaven’s Center*.

The Perfected Sovereign of Heavenly Truth said: To cultivate the Way of Flying Immortality, on the days of *wuxu* and *wuchen*, inscribe in vermilion the first four characters of *Wenju Heaven’s Center*, face the Heavenly Gate, and consume them. In life and death, one shall pass through the Nine Yang Calamities, be reborn in the midst of renewal, ascend to wander in the courts of the Three Realms, and enter the Three Convenient Gates. Furthermore, on days of purification, inscribe in vermilion the fifth and sixth characters, face one’s natal destiny, and consume them. After a hundred days, jade maidens shall descend, and the myriad spirits shall reside within one’s body. Moreover, on the day of the Great Year Star, inscribe in vermilion the seventh and eighth characters, face south, and consume them. After eight years, one’s body shall generate jade light and a natural fragrance, the myriad perfected ones shall gather, jade maidens shall be present in one’s chamber, and the seven ancestors shall all wander in the Purple Yang Hall.

**Qiyao Moyi Heavenly Sound Jade Formula, Sixth Section**
The first and second characters of *Moyi Heaven’s Center* are inscribed above the Jade Pass of the Mysterious Capital, governing the flight and opening of the light of Great Possession, and the sprinkling of natural numinosity. The third and fourth characters are inscribed upon the Purple Tenuity Terrace, governing the opening of the gates of the Nine Darks and the deliverance of souls from the Long Night. The fifth and sixth characters are inscribed upon the Northern Numinous Coil, governing the opening of the Eight Scriptures in the Hollow Cavern and the subduing of the myriad demons in the imperial court. The seventh and eighth characters are inscribed upon the Northern Culmen, governing the ledgers of good and evil in the records of life and death. Together, the eight characters span a *zhang* in all directions, their eight corners radiant in *Qiyao Heaven’s Center*.

The Perfected Sovereign of Heavenly Truth said: To cultivate the Way of Flying Immortality, on the day of one’s natal destiny, inscribe in vermilion the first two characters, face one’s natal destiny, and consume them for a year. In life and death, one shall attain merit equal to the Flying Immortals, and after death, one shall not pass through the Earth Official but ascend directly to the Upper Palace of the Mysterious Capital. Furthermore, on the days of *gengshen* and *jiashen*, inscribe in vermilion the third and fourth characters, face the northwest, and consume them. After a hundred days, the seven ancestors shall all depart from the Long Night and ascend to the Eight Gates of the Vermilion Mound Palace.

On the fifth day of the fifth month at noon, inscribe in vermilion the fifth and sixth characters, face south, and consume them. After twenty-four years, one shall roam freely within *Moye Heaven*, summoning demons and subduing spirits, with power over millions.

On the seventh day of the seventh month, inscribe in vermilion the seventh and eighth characters, face one’s natal destiny, and consume them. After a hundred days, the Northern Emperor shall erase one’s name from the Register of Death, the Southern Palace shall inscribe it in the Book of Life, and the Deity of Destiny shall record one’s ascension to immortality, thus perfecting the attainment of Perfected Personhood.

**Xuwu Yueheng Heaven’s Jade Instructions, Scroll Seven**
In *Yueheng Heaven*, the first and second characters are inscribed upon the Primordial Beginning’s Mysterious Terrace, governing the fundamental principles of heaven and earth’s opening and closing, and the Dao above the Eight Corners of the *Weiluo*.

The third and fourth characters are inscribed upon the Northern Mysterious Pass, governing the circulation of *qi*.

The fifth and sixth characters are inscribed upon the Heavenly Gate of the Northwest, governing the hidden and manifest movements of the Five Chapters of the Perfected Writ, and the opening of the cycle of life and death.

The seventh and eighth characters are inscribed upon the Terrace of the Nine Nights, governing the return of the dead souls to the numinous, their rebirth among humanity, the reckoning of life and death, and the karmic roots of countless kalpas.

The Perfected Sovereign of Heavenly Truth said: To cultivate the Way of Flying Immortality, on the day of one’s natal destiny, inscribe in vermilion the first and second characters, face the Heavenly Gate, and consume them. This shall bind the spirits of the body to the cycles of life and death, ensuring perpetual blessings without departure.

Furthermore, on the day of one’s current age, inscribe in vermilion the third and fourth characters, face the Earthly Door, and consume them. This shall bind the essence and *qi* of the body to the cycles of life and death, ensuring perpetual residence in the Southern Palace without separation from one’s form.

On the day of the Grand Year Star, inscribe in vermilion the fifth and sixth characters, face the Grand Year Star, and consume them for eight years. The five viscera shall all radiate purple light, and the myriad spirits shall be refined, transforming life and death into immortality.

On the day of the Winter Solstice, inscribe in vermilion the seventh and eighth characters, face north, and consume them. The nine generations of ancestors shall all depart from the Dark Night and ascend to the Southern Palace. One’s body shall move in harmony with the Primordial Beginning, revolving through countless kalpas without end, attaining merit equal to the Flying Immortals.

**Supreme Mystery Concealing Heaven’s Jade Instructions, Scroll Eight**
In *Mengyi Heaven*, the first, second, third, and fourth characters are inscribed upon the Nine Bends of Dragon Mountain’s Long Tower, governing the ceremonial observances of the Imperial Lord’s ascent and descent.

The fifth and sixth characters are inscribed upon the Mysterious Terrace of the Northern Dipper, governing the Registers of Life and Death.

The seventh and eighth characters are inscribed within the Palace of Longevity of the Southern Dipper, governing the passage of dead souls into the Southern Palace, the spirits subjected to refinement, and the conferral of names for rebirth.

The Most High Cavernous Mystery, Numinous Treasure, *The Heavenly Inner Sounds of the Spontaneous Jade Script*, Scroll Two

---

The Great Brahmā’s Hidden Language, the Immeasurable Cavernous Chapters

At that time, the Celestial Worthy of Original Beginning was seated with the Five Venerable Thearchs, the great sagely hosts of the ten directions, and the boundless perfected lords and elders in the Cypress Mound Lodge within the Crimson Clarity World, beneath the Long Mulberry in the Fragrant Grove Garden. As the Celestial Worthy turned his carriage, the hosts of heaven descended from their seats. Then clouds and mist surged thickly, the four directions darkened, and for three days and nights, the mysterious yin did not disperse, heaven and earth lost their light, as if before the Dragon Han—a profound and obscure gloom.

The Five Venerable Thearchs stepped forward, made obeisance, and addressed the Celestial Worthy: "Today, as we attend your seat, we have never before experienced such a thing. When the Celestial Worthy departs, the hosts of heaven overturn their carriages, the divine and sagely thearchs, the jade maidens, the sun, moon, and stars, the pivot and jade balance, the officials of the Three Realms, the immortals of the Five Peaks, the water thearchs of rivers and seas—all spirits without exception—stand in solemn reverence, attending the Heavenly Perfected. Yet now the heavens are bright and the air clear, the wind does not stir the branches, the earth is free of flying dust, rivers and seas are still, mountains and peaks conceal their mists, the time is harmonious and the qi settled, causing the living and the dead to rejoice together. But the celestial light is obscured, the daylight grows dim, the heavenly beings are alarmed, and the assembly is uneasy. We do not know the reason for this, nor why it has come to pass. We humbly beseech your instruction, that all may see the light, and all beings universally attain peace."

The Celestial Worthy replied: "Today, as we sit together, such joy is rarely encountered. The heavens emit auspicious signs, and the numinous responses arise spontaneously. The jade script shines brilliantly, veiling the celestial light. At the beginning of its transmission, this causes the daylight to darken—a rare and auspicious convergence. Now, for the sake of the four assemblies, I shall reveal the wondrous celestial portent, delivering all beings. Let all in the assembly close their eyes and prostrate themselves upon the earth."

Thereupon, the sagely hosts of heaven simultaneously closed their eyes and prostrated themselves to receive the command. In an instant, the celestial qi cleared, the gloom dissipated, and five-colored light illuminated the five directions. Suddenly, a celestial script of characters a *zhang* square appeared spontaneously in the empty mystery above, within the five-colored light. Its radiance shone brilliantly, eight rays trailing from its corners, its luminous essence dazzling the eyes, making it impossible to gaze upon.

The Celestial Worthy addressed the great assembly: "The numinous script of the Eight Assemblies has no fixed form; its meaning is profound and obscure, difficult to fathom. Since heaven has bestowed this response, the wondrous Dao should be made clear. Now, take up your brushes and interpret its true sounds, so that the imperial Dao may flow freely, and its blessings extend to the ten directions."

The Heavenly Perfected Sovereign Lord bowed his head, made obeisance, and addressed the Celestial Worthy: "Since following the turning of the kalpas through countless eons, I have repeatedly attended your seat, yet never before have I encountered such an occasion—witnessing the opening of the dharma gates and beholding the celestial script, the spontaneous and utmost real. This qi of the Eight Assemblies harmonizes with the Five Harmonies’ sounds, beyond the capacity of foolish thoughts and shallow reflections to fully comprehend."

Now, having taken my place among the assembly and gazed upon these profound mysteries, I have received this command in trepidation. Unworthy as I am, I dare not conceal my thoughts, though my heart trembles as if bereft of divine protection. Thus, I shall exhaust my understanding to interpret and annotate its sounds, hoping that the myriad beings may align with it, and that future generations may grasp what was once beyond reach. May your boundless compassion be upon me.

Thereupon, the Divine Consort took up her brush, the Supreme Perfected swept the mat, jade maidens held the silk, golden youths wafted incense, moon-palace maidens scattered blossoms, sun spirits poured nectar, the Five Elders oversaw the trial, and the Three Realms guarded the true. Their ranks were arrayed by measure.

The thirty-two heavens each bear eight characters. The Great Yellow Sovereign Ever-Heaven, the Great Bright Jade Perfect Heaven, the Clear Bright How-Child Heaven, the Mysterious Womb Level-Nurturing Heaven, the Primordial Bright Literary Ascendant Heaven, the Upper Bright Seven Luminaries Majestic Heaven, the Void Transcending Balance Heaven, and the Supreme Ultimate Veiled Heaven—these eight heavens, comprising sixty-four characters, belong to the Eastern Quarter’s Nine Qi Azure Heaven. The Radiant Bright Harmonious Yang Heaven, the Mysterious Bright Reverent Splendor Heaven, the Shining Bright Ancestral Whirlwind Heaven, the Bamboo-Falling August Reed Heaven, the Void Bright Hall-Shining Heaven, the Contemplative Bright Upright Stillness Heaven, the Mysterious Bright Reverent Celebration Heaven, and the Great Resplendent Ultimate Jade Heaven—these eight heavens, comprising sixty-four characters, belong to the Southern Quarter’s Three Qi Cinnabar Heaven. The Primordial Bearing Perforated Ascent Heaven, the Great Peace August Cliff Heaven, the Manifest Determined Ultimate Wind Heaven, the Beginning Yellow Filial Awn Heaven, the Great August Venerable Double-Floating Vessel Heaven, the Non-Thought River Origin Heaven, the Upper Casting Joyous Heaven, and the Boundless Vow Pledge Heaven—these eight heavens, comprising sixty-four characters, belong to the Western Quarter’s Seven Qi Pale Heaven. The Luminous Court Rosy Dawn Heaven, the Abyssal Penetrating Primordial Cavern Heaven, the Great Literary Flourishing Wondrous Completion Heaven, the Great Plain Elegant Joy Forbidden Upper Heaven, the Great Void Non-Above Constant Fusion Heaven, the Great Release Jade Dragon Ascendant Victory Heaven, the Dragon-Transforming Brahman Transcendence Heaven, and the Supreme Ultimate Level-Nurturing Splendid Prosperity Heaven—these eight heavens, comprising sixty-four characters, belong to the Northern Quarter’s Five Qi Mysterious Heaven. The four sets of eight heavens make thirty-two heavens in all, totaling two hundred fifty-six characters—all the thirty-two heavens’ great Brahmanic hidden language of boundless sound.

Each heaven possesses the soaring mysterious spontaneous qi, harmonizing with the five tones to form the heavens’ boundless cavernous hymns. Above, they unfold the heavens’ profound mysteries; they praise the Great Existence’s radiant clarity. At their center, they govern the spontaneous qi, universally delivering those who study immortality. Below, they deliver the lives of the dead, rescuing souls from endless night. The Primordial Beginning’s wondrous dharma endures for kalpas uncounted. Now that its sounds are resounding, its Way is practiced.

As the great dharma is revealed, the heavens rejoice. The Boundless Great Sage Host, the Perfected Lords, the Venerable Elders, the Five Elder Thearchs, the deities of the ten directions, the divine immortals, and the jade maidens all circumambulated thrice, offering incense, and intoned this hymn:

The Heavenly Worthy turned his jade chariot,
Descending to the fragrant garden’s seat.
The Perfected, the Great Sages,
The Boundless Kings of Heaven’s midst—
Divine immortals guide the sun and moon,
Lushly arrayed in cloudy palaces.
The Five Thearchs flank the radiant axle,
The Three Realms prepare for the ten directions.
The day celebrates the assembly of the Perfected,
Joy unmatched in its splendor.
The wondrous gathering stirs spontaneous response,
Auspicious omens arise in the empty cavern.
Resplendent, it inaugurates the hidden age,
Outshining the light of sun and moon.
The mysterious yin does not dissolve the night,
The four images stand in tranquil reverence.
The numinous workings follow their destined course,
Revering the clarity of the great void.
The Eight Assemblies’ celestial script,
The five tones harmonize to form its text.
The Heavenly Perfected unravel its wondrous rhymes,
Resonant and vast, it pervades the Great Existence.
The jade sounds defy comparison,
Universally accomplishing heaven and earth’s work.
Above, they plant the roots of the heavens,
Lofty, the lineage of divine immortals.
At their center, they unfold the mysterious cavernous palaces,
Illuminating the eight dark chambers.
They deliver the lives of the dead,
Rescuing souls from endless night.
The Five Pains of hell are dissolved,
The Blade Mountains’ edges no longer form.
The Five Paths hold no opposing souls,
For kalpas uncounted, all become youthful.
Majestic, the Great Vehicle’s transformation,
Its merit universal, without partiality.
The Primordial Beginning revealed the jade script,
Thus is he the King of Heaven’s midst.
Overcome with joy, unable to contain it,
They step lightly, chanting the numinous hymn.

The Heavenly Worthy opened the Great Existence,
The heavens, vast and bright, were illumined.
Wondrous indeed, the Dragon Kalpa’s Way,
The Eight Assemblies coalesced into form.
Resplendent, they soar within the void,
Their flowing light fills the Three Realms’ courts.
The divine chart inaugurates the numinous gathering,
The jade script responds to the scene’s arising.
The Heavenly Perfected penetrate its wondrous essence,
The Five Harmonies unite to form the scripture.
Resonant, the jade sounds ring,
Wafting, they ascend to the emerald Upper Clarity.
They deliver through kalpas without end,
The Nine Darks receive illumination.
Majestic, the great dharma gate,
Instructing all living beings.
Its merit is beyond reckoning,
Joyously delivering for ten thousand ages.

At that time, beneficent grace flowed universally, blessings extended to the ten directions. Those who believed and turned toward the undying all attained long life. The aged reverted to youth, the sick were instantly healed, withered bones revived with qi, dead souls returned to their bodies. The Five Pains were released, hells stilled. All who harbored sincere intent became divine immortals.

The Heavenly Worthy addressed the four assemblies of the Perfected: "Today, we sit together within a single kalpa, revealing the heavens’ numinous mysteries, the spontaneous jade script, delivering all beings. Its blessings are vast and universal, broadly benefiting the multitude. The great dharma now perfected, its grace knows no bounds. The boundless worlds all receive illumination; the Nine Darks are opened, souls of the endless night are pardoned. The living rejoice, the dead are restored. The peoples of the heavens, the karmic ties of past lives, whether male or female, the roots of good and evil, from the beginningless past to this present life—birth and death revolving, misfortunes and karmic bonds entwined—heaven and earth’s successes and failures, merits and transgressions, are difficult to discern. Now, in accordance with the Great Existence, I universally proclaim to the heavens: the sun, moon, and stars; the jade celestial pivot; the Southern and Northern Dippers; the Directors of Destiny and Records; Lord Han, Keeper of Records; the Southern Prosperity Upper Palace; all earth and water deities; the sacred mountains of the Five Marchmounts; the Three Officials and Nine Bureaus; the Twelve River Sources; the courts of endless night; the midst of the Nine Darks; the Four Directors and Five Thearchs; and all spirits—examine the ledgers, trace the origins, weigh the roots of good and evil, distinguish the paths of life and death, list the names and details, erase all entries, sever the threads of causation, and universally grant a single amnesty."

Beginning anew from this moment, may all beings attain the true Dao, and may the great blessings be universally bestowed without partiality. The Heavenly Worthy has decreed, and all heavens reverently comply.

Thereupon, the four assemblies rose as one to bow in homage. Raising their hands, they pointed upward; lowering them, they pointed downward—without above, without below; without limit, without end; without depth, without distance; without darkness, without concealment; without greatness, without smallness; without beginning, without conclusion. All are universally delivered, together receiving radiant illumination. With a snap of the fingers, the assembly was addressed, and all heard.

At that time, the four assemblies simultaneously raised their hands and snapped their fingers toward heaven. The thirty-two heavens, the sun, moon, and stars all shone brightly as one. Beneath the earth, in the nine depths and the boundless abyss, the light penetrated completely, leaving no darkness or obscurity. All that was hidden became visible; Earth Treasury revealed its form. Mountains, rivers, streams, and ravines were all leveled as if stretched smooth. Winter blossoms bore fruit, withered trees flourished anew. Joy spread to all, and merit filled the multitude of beings. Fish and dragons leapt, birds and beasts rejoiced in song. Divine hymns harmonized, and no sorrowful cries were heard upon the paths. Heaven stilled, earth fell silent; the Three Officials withdrew into tranquility, their ledgers and judgments at rest. The Five Paths ceased to arise; humans and spirits rejoiced in peace. The sagely Dao flourished in great harmony.

The Heavenly Perfected Sovereign declared: *"The Inner Sounds of the Heavens, the Spontaneous Jade Characters"*—these are the great Brahmanic hidden words within all heavens, weaving the qi of soaring mystery and harmonizing the sounds of the five directions. They arise above the Primordial Beginning, emerging from the midst of the Empty Cavern. Following the turning of the kalpa, they universally accomplish the work of heaven and earth. This scripture is revered and wondrous, beyond comparison to the ordinary. Thus, at the inception of the Great Existence, the celestial radiance was sealed to treasure the Dao and honor its text. Its characters are profound and subtle, not like the formless writings of heaven. Truly precious are its wondrous symbols, concealing the utmost truth. The marvelous responsive chart follows its ordained course. The Heavenly Worthy did not consider my humble talent but commanded me to elucidate its meaning and convey its jade sounds. The mysterious statutes have their regulations; I dared not disobey the decree. On the day I took up my brush, my form and soul were instantly overwhelmed. Following what I beheld, I humbly annotated its text. Whether right or wrong, I have exhausted my heart’s sincerity. Now that the imperial Dao is illuminated, all heavens rejoice. All that is borne and sustained, the living and the dead, share in this joy. Great blessings universally encompass; my spirit naturally delights. I only wish that the four assemblies may all perceive and embody its clarity.

Thereupon, the perfected deities of the four assemblies as one voiced their approval. From heaven above to heaven below, from earth above to earth below, in the boundless and infinite, throughout the worlds of the Miraculous Net, all spirits without exception modeled their virtue, revering the Great Sage. Rejoicing in the Dao’s revelation, they only wished that the great Dharma would broadly deliver without end, that blessings would flow for kalpas unnumbered, and that the generations would endure forever. Joy and aspiration converged; all universally attained the true Dao, their gratitude boundless.

The four assemblies simultaneously rose as one, bowing in homage and prostrating to receive the decree.

*August Once’s primordial record,*
*Lóu’s capital at the upper realm.*
*Ā Nà resounds with jade chimes,*
*Cāng Xiù’s grace extends afar.*
*From Non-Being, the true arises,*
*Hé’s response bridges the luminous beam.*
*Guān’s awakening illumines the four darknesses,*
*Its tones and rhymes form verses spontaneously.*

The green net orders the Three *Qi*,
*Zhān* meets the Net Heaven’s thoroughfare.

The Heavenly Perfected Sovereign declared:
This verse harmonizes the five directions’ soaring mystery *qi*
with the eight characters’ spontaneous tones in the Imperial Reed Heaven—
called the *"Boundless Cavern Verse."*
The Imperial Reed Heaven lies six thousand myriad *qi* from the Hall Radiance Heaven.

*"Dimly"* means the Primordial Beginning sank into the Central Heaven of Extended Peace,
inscribing jade characters veiled and unmanifest.
When the Dragon Han inaugurated the kalpa,
its script was vast and boundless.
In that age, when the true Dao was encountered,
men and women alike lived thirty-six thousand years.
When that kalpa reached its end,
another kalpa passed,
and the nine *qi* each produced beasts to harm the wicked.
After that kalpa’s opening,
the nine beasts were renamed the Nine Ugly Ghosts.

The Northern Emperor’s Supreme Perfected governs the Register of Life and Death,
thus establishing the Nine Ugly to assist the Three Officials.
When the numbers reach their limit of eighty-one myriad,
the celestial *qi* reverses the Nine Ugly,
who then transform into the Nine Capital Envoys.

*"Shao"* is the esoteric name of the Divine Empyrean King in the Imperial Reed Heaven.
The Divine Empyrean King is the lord of demon kings,
constantly testing those who study the Dao—
whether their learning is upright or not.

The Demon King constantly composes deceptive songs to disturb their minds. Those who remain steadfast—the King will then protect and recommend them, and upon receiving the King’s endorsement, they ascend directly to the Imperial Reed Heaven. *Yuanchan* is the esoteric name of the Lords of the Northern and Southern Dippers. When a person accumulates good deeds, their name is recorded in the Southern Dipper, which then delivers them from the trials of the Three Realms, rescues them from the sufferings of the Nine Dark Prisons, and declares to the Demon King that he dare not harm them. If a person commits evil, the Three Officials report their transgressions to the Northern Dipper, which then informs the Demon King, and the Demon King destroys them. Their souls are consigned to the depths of the Nine Dark Prisons, condemned to eternal servitude in the Long Night, with no end through ten thousand kalpas, forever sunk in wicked karma.

Within the Imperial Reed Heaven stands the Mountain of Golden Splendor, upon which lies the Palace of the Five Emperors, perpetually wreathed in clouds of five colors. The sun and moon flank it on either side, while flying immortals attend its resplendent chariots. Those who complete their studies and attain the Dao all journey to the Mountain of Golden Splendor to receive the token of the Great One, thereby controlling the Divine Empyrean King and extinguishing the trials of the Great Demon. Only then may they ascend the chariot of luminous radiance and roam freely through the Eight Directions.

**Fifth: The Resplendent Void Hall’s Heavenly Sound**
Within the Resplendent Void Hall Heaven, there exists a spontaneous script of eight characters, which reads: *Above the clouds, the Nine Capitals’ flying life arises from the soaring one.*

The Heavenly Perfected of the Celestial Worthy states: These eight characters are the *Flying Mystery Spontaneous Script*, each a *zhang* in size, their radiant patterns illuminating the Eight Directions. The Primordial Beginning descended to teach, instructing the transcription of these characters, the deciphering of their sounds, and the composition of the great esoteric Brahmanic sounds of the Resplendent Void Hall Heaven—sounds of boundless resonance—entrusted to the Dao Lord. He was to teach them to those in the Resplendent Void Hall Heaven whose names were already inscribed among the immortals, so as to deliver those destined for the Dao.

The Cloud Emperor of the Resplendent Void Heaven governs the Gate of Profound Mystery.
Nine-fold layers rise in dense array,
Palaces of the Capitals arrayed with jade roots.
Flying incense encircles the Ten Absolutes,
Vital *qi* refines the Five Souls.
The path of immortality opens of itself,
In the soaring groves, the essential words are sung.

The Heavenly Perfected of the Celestial Worthy states: This hymn harmonizes the *Flying Mystery Qi* of the Five Directions within the Resplendent Void Hall Heaven with the spontaneous sounds of the eight characters, forming the *Boundless Cavern Hymn*.

The Resplendent Void Hall Heaven lies five thousand myriad *qi* from the Upright Serenity Heaven. *Above the clouds* is the esoteric name of the flying divine beings. It opens the Dragon Han kalpa, inaugurates the Crimson Brightness kalpa, unfolds the Spontaneous Script, and establishes the root of Heaven and Earth. Once the Three Images were divided, there arose the Nine-Tiered Terrace, situated upon the Jade Capital Mountain, resplendent above the Mysterious Capital. Flying immortals perpetually scatter the hundred harmonies of incense and pour forth the blossoms of the five clouds in libation.

Upon the terrace of the Flying Immortals stands the Jade Lad of the Great Perfected, who thrice daily revolves the Ten Absolutes’ banner. With each revolution of the banner, the myriad heavens ascend in audience, circling the terrace thrice while chanting the *Cavern Hymn*. *Flying life* is the divine spirit of renewed existence in the Southern Upper Realm. If a practitioner can recite the *Cavern Hymn* with a voice that reaches the Upper Palace, the myriad heavens rejoice, and *Flying Life* then opens the path of immortality, bestowing the *qi* of eternal life to refine the spirits of the Five Souls below. Once the soul-spirits receive refinement, the Eight Radiant Ones are preserved. When the Eight Radiant Ones are fully guarded, they collectively uplift the human body to ascend the Nine-Tiered Terrace, roaming within the soaring groves. Clad in the Heavenly Script and chanting the *Cavern Hymn*, after twenty-four years, they are destined to ascend in audience to the Palace of the Mysterious Capital.

**Sixth: The Observant Brightness Upright Serenity Heavenly Sound**
Within the Observant Brightness Upright Serenity Heaven, there exists a spontaneous script of eight characters, which reads: *Nayū yùfù móluó fǎlún.*

Upright Serenity’s Brahmanic sound,
*Nayū* extends the Ten Turning Heavens.
In solemn silence, the sacred hymn is chanted,
The fragrant youths sing of kalpic years.
*Moyi* bows in reverence upon hearing,
*Luomi* binds himself in restraint.
The Dharma unfolds the path of extinction and deliverance,
The Wheel turns, all return to the True.

The Heavenly Perfected of the Celestial Worthy states: This hymn harmonizes the *Flying Mystery Qi* of the Five Directions within the Upright Serenity Heaven with the spontaneous sounds of the eight characters, forming the *Boundless Cavern Hymn*.

The Upright Serenity Heaven lies four thousand myriad *qi* from the Reverent Celebration Heaven of Mysterious Brightness. *Na* is the esoteric name of the Heavenly King’s attendant, who generates the *qi* of the Four Seasons and the guidelines of empty non-action, thereby rectifying the divisions of the Upright Serenity Heaven. *Yū* is the empty wheel of the Heavenly Pass. *Yùfù* are the names of the divine youths of the Central Dipper, who perpetually revolve the *Yū* wheel within the Great Non-Being, invoking the Heavenly Pass through the Ten Turnings. With the Ten Turnings, the great sages of the Ten Directions ascend in audience to the Jade Palace, and the myriad spirits, in perfect unity, sing with *Yùfù*. *Móluó* is the esoteric name of the Great Demon within Heaven. When *Yùfù* sings, the Demon King binds himself, and the Eight Methods’ Dharma Wheel Gate of Heaven opens to deliver the bodies of worldly scholars. Those who comprehend the *qi* of the Four Seasons and the mechanism of the Ten Turnings enter the Dharma Wheel Gate, mount the chariot of the Eight Radiant Ones, ascend into the Jade Clarity, and present themselves in audience at the Purple Tenuity Terrace, attaining the rank of guests among the host of perfected beings.

Within the Mysterious Brightness Reverent Celebration Heaven, there exists a spontaneous script of eight characters, which reads: *Hóng chí wújìng lǎnzī yùnróng.*

The Mysterious Brightness’ *hóng* and *diāo* abide in the Capital,
*Holding* the vase, they pour into the Eastern Splendor.
The colorless, the profoundly profound lineage,
The mirroring whirlwind, the vast encompassing *Dàluó*.

Grasping Awareness returns to the wondrous of itself,
How could the arising of forms be called excessive?
The revolving resistance does not endure through kalpas,
The encompassing of appearances holds the thread of Great Harmony.

The Perfected Sovereign of the Next Rank said: This *zhang* combines the flying mysterious *qi* of the Five Directions within the Reverent Celebration Heaven with the spontaneous sounds of the eight characters, called the *Boundless Cavern Zhang*. The Reverent Celebration Heaven lies thirty million *qi* from the Ultimate Jade Heaven. *Xuánmíng* marks the boundary of the Reverent Celebration Heaven. *Hóng* is the inner name of the celestial capital’s supervisory deity. *Diāo Capital* is the designation of the Purple Tenuity Palace’s winding chambers, where the supervisor’s altar governs the innermost recesses, collating the registers of all perfected beings and the texts inscribed on yellow slips. *Té* is the name of the dragon stables, where all dragons coil within, perpetually holding golden vases to convey the splendor of the Eastern Well, irrigating the perfected of all heavens. *Huá* is the essence of the moon’s yellow blossom, its numinous infusion flowing into the Eastern Well as an inexhaustible source of fluid. *Wújìng* refers to the flying divine kings who roam above the *Dàluó*, emitting colorless light, overseeing the registers of life and death, and delivering those who study the Dao. *Lǎnzī* is the gate of the Three Realms; knowing the name *Lǎnzī*, the divine kings extract souls from the Nine Glooms, unlock the long night’s repository, and deliver them through the gate of the Three Realms. *Yùnróng* refers to the Jade Maiden of Great Harmony; when one is delivered through the Three Realms, she revolves their appearance, guiding them with vermilion numinous *qi* and irrigating them with the fluid of Great Harmony. The *Supremely Radiant Ultimate Jade Heaven* Eighth
Within the Supremely Radiant Ultimate Jade Heaven, there are eight characters of spontaneous script, which read: *Fùlǎng Kuòyì Shényīng Zìgōng*. The supremely radiant *Fù* ascends the capital,
The luminous terrace graces the Western Numinous.
*Kuò* serves as the great model,
The resplendent divine lord is born.
The divine is the lineage of extinction and deliverance,
The garlanded cords extract from the long darkness.

The Perfected Sovereign of Heavenly Truth said: This *zhang* combines the flying mysterious *qi* of the Five Directions within the Ultimate Jade Heaven with the spontaneous sounds of the eight characters, called the *Boundless Cavern Zhang*. The Ultimate Jade Heaven lies twenty million *qi* from the *Kǒngshēng* Heaven. *Tàihuàn* marks the primordial origin of the Ultimate Jade Heaven. When the Crimson Clarity first opened, the eight characters blazed above the empty mystery, and thus the Ultimate Jade Heaven was established. *Fùlǎng* is another name for the Jade Capital’s Mysterious Terrace within this heaven, where the Western Numinous Perfected constantly recite the *Boundless Cavern Zhang*, circling above it. *Kuòyì* is the inner name of the divine lord of this heaven, who was born together with the Primordial Beginning as the model of mysterious *qi*, opening the gate of extinction and deliverance to instruct those who study immortality. If one can clarify the sounds of the eight characters, the divine lord will open the door of the long darkness, and the body will enter the gate of renewal, ascending to the terrace of the Jade Capital. Rejoicing in the Purple Tenuity Palace, there is the *Divine Garland Zhang*; the corpse of extinction and deliverance, having obtained the divine garlanded youths, sings the *Boundless Zhang* once and immediately regains form within the Three Refinements’ chamber, receiving the spontaneous *qi* and rejoicing in boundless ages.

The Primordial Heavenly Worthy addressed the Most High Dao Lord, saying: When the Crimson Clarity first opened, the *qi* of the Eight Heavens was apportioned and assigned to the Southern Cinnabar Heaven. Each heaven possesses eight characters, combining into sixty-four sounds, all of which are the great esoteric Brahmanic sounds of boundless resonance within the heavens. Those who practice the Way of the Three *Qi* Heavenly Lords should wear these sounds, recite this *zhang*, and when entering or exiting, traveling or wandering, always knock their teeth three times. Visualize the Vermilion Phoenix soaring before them, with crimson clouds in three layers enveloping their form. The secret incantation reads:

The Three *Qi* meander,
The numinous phoenix comes flying.
The eight characters of jade sound
Blaze resplendent in the Purple Tenuity.
Auspicious day, great celebration,
My Dao opens boundlessly.
Vermilion cinnabar, sweet as nectar,
I gaze upward to the numinous radiance.
Body born of water and fire,
Crimson mantle and feathered robe.
Ascending the empty mystery’s steps,
Feet tread the phoenix’s ladder.
Circling the Eight Heavens,
Seven ancestors follow.
Conclude by drawing in *qi* and swallowing three times. Practicing this for three years, the Eight Heavens will each send eight Jade Maidens of Great Cinnabar and eight Jade Lads of Great Yang to attend and guard one’s form, bestowing vermilion cinnabar, the essence of the Three *Qi*, reversing whiteness to preserve appearance, enduring ten thousand kalpas without decline. Seven ancestors ascend together, entering the Hall of Blessings, returning to the womb of the royal family, and immediately attaining rebirth. This method is vast and universal, delivering boundlessly. Diligently apply the mind, receive it earnestly, and never forget. The Dao Lord bowed his head and reverently received the decree.

Within the Primordial Qi *Kǒngshēng* Heaven, there are eight characters of spontaneous script, which read: *Rènlì Chányóu Póní Jiùtōng*. The primordial *Yuán* delights in joyous realms,
*Lì* floats upon the flaming Yang cavern.
*Chán* offers in the realm of suffering’s arising,
*Yóu* commands transformation in the Southern Palace.
*Pó* possesses refining pools,
*Ní*’s fluid adorns carved appearances.
*Jiù* and *chǒu* obstruct the source of life,
*Tōng* and *bó* wildly drum the vast expanse.

The Perfected Sovereign of Heavenly Truth said: This chapter combines the flying, mysterious *qi* of the five directions within the *Kǒngshēng* Heaven, harmonizing it with the spontaneous sounds of the eight characters, called the *Wúliàng Dòng* Chapter. The *Kǒngshēng* Heaven lies nine million *qi* from the *Huángyá* Heaven.

*Yuán* is the beginning of origins, the *qi* of Brahmanic conduct that forms the *Kǒngshēng* Heaven. *Rènlì* is the name of the boundless world to the south, and *chán* is the land of *Rènlì*. Those born in that realm take suffering as their root, devoid of goodness. Above its domain stands the Cavern of Yang, where floating flames form a flowing fire-court, its radiance resplendent. Once the numinous script is revealed, the land of *Rènlì* transforms into a hall of blessed virtue, and the souls of the suffering are all delivered into the Cavern of Yang.

*Yóu* is the inner name of the Lord of Life in the Southern Palace. *Pó* and *ní* are the divine youths of the refining pools. Those delivered to the Cavern of Yang all proceed to the refining pools to undergo the refinement of the divine youths, reborn into a world of blessed virtue. *Jiù* and *tōng* are demonic spirits of the *Rènlì* world, ever obstructing the path of life’s renewal. When one learns the name of the Lord of Life, proceeds to the divine youths for refinement, the demonic spirits submit. Mastering the sounds of the eight characters, the *Rènlì* realm’s boundless numinous officials guard one’s body. Journeying to the Southern Palace, immortals await to receive them. After three years, they shall surely ride the cinnabar wheels of the clouds, ascending to the Heaven of Three *Qi*.

Supreme Peace in the vast desert,
*Sǒu* distant in the Crimson Clarity.
Washing away the dust’s miasma,
The realm of form shines with the azure of the Great Net.

The vast desert guides the true code,
The distant and subtle, the empty cavern’s scripture.
Traversing the sincerity of flying heavens,
Majestic, they transform and rebirth.

The Perfected Sovereign of Heavenly Truth said: This chapter combines the flying, mysterious *qi* of the five directions within the *Huángyá* Heaven, harmonizing it with the spontaneous sounds of the eight characters, called the *Wúliàng Dòng* Chapter. The *Huángyá* Heaven lies eight million *qi* from the Heaven of Ultimate Wind.

*Tài* is the name of emptiness, by which the *Huángyá* Heaven is established in peace. This heaven has its sovereigns, whose oversight is named *Wǎn Sǒu*, opening the path of the vast desert to reveal the script of the eight characters. Once the Dao is made manifest, the Great Net above becomes serene and clear. *Dí Sè* are the flying immortals of the realm of form, ever riding chariots of luminous clouds, drawn by nine-colored dragons. They roam above the Three Realms, entering and exiting the Jade Clarity, sweeping away the *qi* of dust and defilement, delivering those of good roots.

*Tài Miǎo* is the transformation of the empty cavern, weaving spontaneous chapters to clarify the Dao’s principles and exhort salvation for the myriad beings. Those who study and perceive the sounds of the eight characters, penetrating the names of the heavens, shall have flying immortals descend with chariots of luminous clouds to bear them upward to the Terrace of Transformed Birth.

The Brahmanic net turns the kalpas of heaven,

The flying immortals turn the gates of the nine heavens, while the great spirit secures the root of the Ultimate Wind.

They traverse the long night, reviewing the registers of life and death, delivering the souls of those with good roots. For ten thousand kalpas, they remain ever attendant, recording all.

Those who cultivate the numinous script of the *Dòng* Chapter shall gaze upward to the chambers of the nine mysteries, then ride clouds of three colors to ascend to the grasses of the Radiant Emperor. They shall rescue the souls of the Nine Glooms, and the dead shall be reborn through the Dharma Wheel’s gate.

Awakened, it meets the Mara Perfected;
its head bears the Three Pure Winds.
The Lesser Lad attends the Vermilion Sun;
the Capital Round illumines the depths of darkness.

The Heaven of Filial Vastness lies six million *qi* above the Heaven of Floating Countenance. The great Brahmanic *qi* of the Primordial August Heaven governs and sustains the Heaven of Filial Vastness. Within this heaven resides a Heavenly King, named *Yi Miao*. He has come since the Dragon Han and emerged in the Vermilion Brightness, dwelling amid the primal unfolding—hence called "boundless emptiness." Within the formless void, he abides in the silent, silent courts; his divine radiance and jade beauty mark the standard of the myriad Ways. *Wan Shou* is the title of the Most High Dao Lord. The Dao Lord rides the Eightfold Radiance Jade Chariot, urging the Three Pure Clouds, unfolding the profound mysteries of the Primordial Beginning, and expounding the great Dharma to deliver beings. *Shao Du* is the name of the divine lad within the sun. He ever scatters solar essence to bathe the Perfected, streams flying blossoms to brush the numinous, opens the gates of long night, and illumines the chambers of the Nine Dark Realms. The Heavenly King descends in his flying radiance chariot, alighting upon the Three Pure Carriages, delivering beings above the Three Realms and entering the silent, silent courts.

The Grand August Azure Cloud Tower,

Zhú’s songs echo in the void.

The Florid Realm’s Gate of Multitudinous Desires,

It extends to host ten thousand myriad crowds,

The Perfected Sovereign of Heavenly Truth said: This chapter blends the flying, mysterious *qi* of the five directions from the Heaven of Floating Countenance with the spontaneous sounds of the eight characters, called the *Wúliàng Dòng* Chapter. The *qi* of the Grand August Middle Prime, the warp of the Vast Brahmanic Silence, forms the Heaven of Grand August Venerable. The heavens possess nine-tiered towers, their cloud-*qi* soaring in majesty. *Ā* is the hidden name of the Heavenly King. He ever rides the Wheel of Radiant Clouds, roaming the nine-tiered *Ā*, dwelling atop the Jade Tower, where he intones the *Dòng* Chapter to summon the Demon Kings. Above lies the abode of perfected immortals; below, the dwelling of ghosts and spirits. *Yùmò* is the hidden name of the Demon King of Heaven’s Center. *Zhú* is the Demon King’s capital overseer. They dwell above the Realm of Desire, chanting the empty and cavernous hymns; *Yán* is the Courtyard that binds ghosts, and *Yóu* the chamber that imprisons them. When the Heavenly King ascends the Cloud Tower and intones the *Wúliàng* Chapter, the heavenly demons respond in echo, and the grass ghosts prostrate themselves in the Courtyard of *Yóu*. The Perfected ever wear the eight characters to soar through the void, reciting the *Wúliàng* to ascend to Jade Clarity.
