chunks.original_text: 今既厕座次，仰睹玄妙，被命狼狈，不敢藏情，逆用张惶，若无神守，辄竭所见，解注其音，冀万有合，开示来生不及之体。 惟蒙曲悯。 於是灵妃按笔，太真拂筵，玉女执巾，金童扬香，月宫散花，日精灌津，五老监试，三界卫真，分其分度。 三十二天，天有八字。 其太黄皇曾天、太明玉完天、清明何童天、玄胎平育天、元明文举天、上明七曜摩夷天、虚无越衡天、太极蒙翳天，八天合六十四字，位属东方九炁青天。 其赤明和阳天、玄明恭华天、曜明宗飘天、竺落皇笳天、虚明堂曜天、观明端静天、玄明恭庆天、太焕极瑶天，八天合六十四字，位属南方三炁丹天。 其元载孔升天、太安皇崖天、显定极风天，始黄孝芒天、太皇翁重浮容天、无思江由天、上揲阮乐天，无极昙誓天，八天合六十四字，位属西方七炁素天。 其皓庭霄度天、渊通元洞天、太文翰宠妙成天、太素秀乐禁上天、太虚无上常融天、太释玉隆腾胜天、龙变梵度天、太极平育贾奕天，八天合六十四字，位属北方五炁玄天。 四八天合三十二天，合二百五十 六字，皆三十二天大梵隐语无量之音。 天有飞玄自然之炁，合和五音，以成天中无量洞章，上演诸天之玄奥，赞大有之开明，中理自然之炁，普度学仙之人，下度生死之命，拔出长夜之魂，元始妙法，亿劫长存，其音既朗，其道行焉。 大法开明，诸天称庆，无极大圣众至真，诸君丈人，五老上帝，十方尊神，神仙玉女，一时行香，旋行三匝，而作颂曰： 天尊回玉驾，降席香园中。 至真大圣众，无极天中王。 神仙导日月，郁郁披云宫。 五帝翼华辕，三界备十方。 日庆众真会，欢乐难为双。 妙会自然感，灵瑞发空洞。 焕烂启幽期，障蔽日月光。 玄阴不解夜，四象并安恭。 灵运自应图，鲦钦明太空。 灵书八会字，五音合成文。 天真解妙韵，琅琅大有通。 玉音难为譬，普成天地功。 上植诸天根，落落神仙宗。 中演玄洞府，坦明八幽房。 开度生死命，拔出长夜亡。 地狱五苦解，刀山不生锋。 五道无对魂，亿劫并少童。 堂堂大乘化，一切不偏功。 元始出玉文，是为天中王。 不胜情欢喜，飞步诵灵章。 天尊开大有，落落诸天明。 妙哉龙汉道，八会结成形。 焕烂飞空内，流光三界庭。 神图启灵会，玉书应景生。 天真通妙趣，五和合成经。 琅琅玉音响，飘飘翠上清。 开度无终劫，九幽受光明。 巍巍大法门，教导一切生。 斯功不可胜，欢乐度万龄。 是时惠泽普流，恩被十方，信向不死，皆得长年。 老者还少，病者即康，枯骨生气，死魂还人，五苦解脱，地狱宁闲。 预以有心，皆得神仙矣。 天尊告四众至真：今日同坐一劫之中，开天灵奥，自然玉书，度一切人，其福弘普，广益众生。 大法既陶，恩无不匝，无极世界，皆受光明，九幽开宥，长夜赦魂。 生者欢乐，死者蒙还，诸天人民，宿对种亲，是男是女，善恶命根，无始以来，至于今生，生死展转，殃对相牵，天地成败，功过难明。 今依大有，普告诸天，日月星宿、璇玑玉衡、南斗北斗、司命司录、韩君主录、南昌上宫、诸地诸水、五岳灵山、三官九署、十二河源、长夜之府、九幽之中、四司五帝、一切神灵，采算录籍，推校本源，无善无恶，轻重之根，生死右别，条名列言，一切削除，断绝因绿，普同一度。
chunks.translated_text:
Now, having taken my place among the assembly and gazed upon these profound mysteries, I have received this command in trepidation. Unworthy as I am, I dare not conceal my thoughts, though my heart trembles as if bereft of divine protection. Thus, I shall exhaust my understanding to interpret and annotate its sounds, hoping that the myriad beings may align with it, and that future generations may grasp what was once beyond reach. May your boundless compassion be upon me.

Thereupon, the Divine Consort took up her brush, the Supreme Perfected swept the mat, jade maidens held the silk, golden youths wafted incense, moon-palace maidens scattered blossoms, sun spirits poured nectar, the Five Elders oversaw the trial, and the Three Realms guarded the true. Their ranks were arrayed by measure.

The thirty-two heavens each bear eight characters. The Great Yellow Sovereign Ever-Heaven, the Great Bright Jade Perfect Heaven, the Clear Bright How-Child Heaven, the Mysterious Womb Level-Nurturing Heaven, the Primordial Bright Literary Ascendant Heaven, the Upper Bright Seven Luminaries Majestic Heaven, the Void Transcending Balance Heaven, and the Supreme Ultimate Veiled Heaven—these eight heavens, comprising sixty-four characters, belong to the Eastern Quarter’s Nine Qi Azure Heaven. The Radiant Bright Harmonious Yang Heaven, the Mysterious Bright Reverent Splendor Heaven, the Shining Bright Ancestral Whirlwind Heaven, the Bamboo-Falling August Reed Heaven, the Void Bright Hall-Shining Heaven, the Contemplative Bright Upright Stillness Heaven, the Mysterious Bright Reverent Celebration Heaven, and the Great Resplendent Ultimate Jade Heaven—these eight heavens, comprising sixty-four characters, belong to the Southern Quarter’s Three Qi Cinnabar Heaven. The Primordial Bearing Perforated Ascent Heaven, the Great Peace August Cliff Heaven, the Manifest Determined Ultimate Wind Heaven, the Beginning Yellow Filial Awn Heaven, the Great August Venerable Double-Floating Vessel Heaven, the Non-Thought River Origin Heaven, the Upper Casting Joyous Heaven, and the Boundless Vow Pledge Heaven—these eight heavens, comprising sixty-four characters, belong to the Western Quarter’s Seven Qi Pale Heaven. The Luminous Court Rosy Dawn Heaven, the Abyssal Penetrating Primordial Cavern Heaven, the Great Literary Flourishing Wondrous Completion Heaven, the Great Plain Elegant Joy Forbidden Upper Heaven, the Great Void Non-Above Constant Fusion Heaven, the Great Release Jade Dragon Ascendant Victory Heaven, the Dragon-Transforming Brahman Transcendence Heaven, and the Supreme Ultimate Level-Nurturing Splendid Prosperity Heaven—these eight heavens, comprising sixty-four characters, belong to the Northern Quarter’s Five Qi Mysterious Heaven. The four sets of eight heavens make thirty-two heavens in all, totaling two hundred fifty-six characters—all the thirty-two heavens’ great Brahmanic hidden language of boundless sound.

Each heaven possesses the soaring mysterious spontaneous qi, harmonizing with the five tones to form the heavens’ boundless cavernous hymns. Above, they unfold the heavens’ profound mysteries; they praise the Great Existence’s radiant clarity. At their center, they govern the spontaneous qi, universally delivering those who study immortality. Below, they deliver the lives of the dead, rescuing souls from endless night. The Primordial Beginning’s wondrous dharma endures for kalpas uncounted. Now that its sounds are resounding, its Way is practiced.

As the great dharma is revealed, the heavens rejoice. The Boundless Great Sage Host, the Perfected Lords, the Venerable Elders, the Five Elder Thearchs, the deities of the ten directions, the divine immortals, and the jade maidens all circumambulated thrice, offering incense, and intoned this hymn:

The Heavenly Worthy turned his jade chariot,
Descending to the fragrant garden’s seat.
The Perfected, the Great Sages,
The Boundless Kings of Heaven’s midst—
Divine immortals guide the sun and moon,
Lushly arrayed in cloudy palaces.
The Five Thearchs flank the radiant axle,
The Three Realms prepare for the ten directions.
The day celebrates the assembly of the Perfected,
Joy unmatched in its splendor.
The wondrous gathering stirs spontaneous response,
Auspicious omens arise in the empty cavern.
Resplendent, it inaugurates the hidden age,
Outshining the light of sun and moon.
The mysterious yin does not dissolve the night,
The four images stand in tranquil reverence.
The numinous workings follow their destined course,
Revering the clarity of the great void.
The Eight Assemblies’ celestial script,
The five tones harmonize to form its text.
The Heavenly Perfected unravel its wondrous rhymes,
Resonant and vast, it pervades the Great Existence.
The jade sounds defy comparison,
Universally accomplishing heaven and earth’s work.
Above, they plant the roots of the heavens,
Lofty, the lineage of divine immortals.
At their center, they unfold the mysterious cavernous palaces,
Illuminating the eight dark chambers.
They deliver the lives of the dead,
Rescuing souls from endless night.
The Five Pains of hell are dissolved,
The Blade Mountains’ edges no longer form.
The Five Paths hold no opposing souls,
For kalpas uncounted, all become youthful.
Majestic, the Great Vehicle’s transformation,
Its merit universal, without partiality.
The Primordial Beginning revealed the jade script,
Thus is he the King of Heaven’s midst.
Overcome with joy, unable to contain it,
They step lightly, chanting the numinous hymn.

The Heavenly Worthy opened the Great Existence,
The heavens, vast and bright, were illumined.
Wondrous indeed, the Dragon Kalpa’s Way,
The Eight Assemblies coalesced into form.
Resplendent, they soar within the void,
Their flowing light fills the Three Realms’ courts.
The divine chart inaugurates the numinous gathering,
The jade script responds to the scene’s arising.
The Heavenly Perfected penetrate its wondrous essence,
The Five Harmonies unite to form the scripture.
Resonant, the jade sounds ring,
Wafting, they ascend to the emerald Upper Clarity.
They deliver through kalpas without end,
The Nine Darks receive illumination.
Majestic, the great dharma gate,
Instructing all living beings.
Its merit is beyond reckoning,
Joyously delivering for ten thousand ages.

At that time, beneficent grace flowed universally, blessings extended to the ten directions. Those who believed and turned toward the undying all attained long life. The aged reverted to youth, the sick were instantly healed, withered bones revived with qi, dead souls returned to their bodies. The Five Pains were released, hells stilled. All who harbored sincere intent became divine immortals.

The Heavenly Worthy addressed the four assemblies of the Perfected: "Today, we sit together within a single kalpa, revealing the heavens’ numinous mysteries, the spontaneous jade script, delivering all beings. Its blessings are vast and universal, broadly benefiting the multitude. The great dharma now perfected, its grace knows no bounds. The boundless worlds all receive illumination; the Nine Darks are opened, souls of the endless night are pardoned. The living rejoice, the dead are restored. The peoples of the heavens, the karmic ties of past lives, whether male or female, the roots of good and evil, from the beginningless past to this present life—birth and death revolving, misfortunes and karmic bonds entwined—heaven and earth’s successes and failures, merits and transgressions, are difficult to discern. Now, in accordance with the Great Existence, I universally proclaim to the heavens: the sun, moon, and stars; the jade celestial pivot; the Southern and Northern Dippers; the Directors of Destiny and Records; Lord Han, Keeper of Records; the Southern Prosperity Upper Palace; all earth and water deities; the sacred mountains of the Five Marchmounts; the Three Officials and Nine Bureaus; the Twelve River Sources; the courts of endless night; the midst of the Nine Darks; the Four Directors and Five Thearchs; and all spirits—examine the ledgers, trace the origins, weigh the roots of good and evil, distinguish the paths of life and death, list the names and details, erase all entries, sever the threads of causation, and universally grant a single amnesty."

This qi of the Eight Assemblies harmonizes with the Five Harmonies’ sounds, beyond the capacity of foolish thoughts and shallow reflections to fully comprehend."

chunks.original_text: 以今为新，令此一切，咸得道真，大福所普，勿使有偏。 天尊有命，诸天敬从。 於是四众同起作礼。 举手指上，俛手指下，无上无下，无极无穷，无深无远，无幽无隐，无大无小，无始无终，一切普度，同受光明，弹指告众，一切咸闻。 是时四众同时抗手，仰天弹指。 三十二天，日月星宿，一时俱明，地下九幽，无极之底，光景洞彻，无复暗冥，幽隐普见，地藏露形，山川溪涧，一等缅平，冬华结实，枯树发荣，庆加一切，功载众生，鱼龙踊跃，鸟兽欣呜，灵歌交会，路无悲声，天静地默，三官潜宁，简对休息，五道不生，人神欢泰，圣道太平。 天真皇人曰：《诸天内音自然玉字》 ，皆诸天之中大梵隐语，结飞玄之炁，合和五方之音，生於元始之上，出空洞之中。 随运开度，普成天地之功。 斯文尊妙，不譬於常，是故开大有之始，而闭天光明，以宝其道，而尊其文。 其字宛奥，非天书之无形，真贵其妙象，而隐其至真。 妙感应图，其法运行，天尊不以我之才吶，而见命＠，使解其义，通其玉音。 玄科有制，不敢违命。 按笔之日，形魂顿丧，率我所见，聊注其文。 是之与非，极我乃心。 皇道既明，诸天称庆，一切覆载，生死并欢，大福普匝，我情自欣，惟愿四众，咸见体明。 於是四众至真尊神，一时称善。 天上天下，地上地下，无穷无极，弥罗世界，一切神灵，莫不范德，尊崇大圣，欣道开明，惟愿大法，广度无终，福流亿劫，世世长存，庆加愿会，普得道真，不胜罔极。 四众同时俱起，作礼稽首受命。 太黄皇曾天音第－ 太黄皇曾天中，有自然之书八字，文曰亶娄阿荟无和观音。 天真皇人曰：其八字，飞玄自然之书，字方一丈，文彩焕明，洞辉八方。 元始下教，使撰其字，解其音，合成皇曾天中大梵隐语无量之音，以付道君，使教皇曾天中宿有仙名者，度应得道人也。 皇曾亶元纪，娄都界上京。 阿那震琳响，苍秀何宛延。 元无中生真，和答通明梁。 观觉朗四冥，音韵自成章。 天真皇人曰：其章以皇曾天中合五方飞玄之炁，以和八字自然之音，曰无量洞章。 皇曾天去太明玉完天九亿九万炁，元纪以八方维罗之极。 娄都者，天中心长楼之名，上承太玄之宫玉京之山也。 阿那以娄都之监，主六梵之数，数交则娄都鼓呜，众真上朝。 荟秀则帝君之游台，和答则日月之门户。 真人乘金轮以开冥，玉女仗华旛，而披纽观觉，主长夜之录。 四冥拔出九幽之府。 若能修斋於八节，诵洞章以和魂，则七祖披朗，朽骸还门，佩赤书於八字，明通无量之音，将乘云车以上造逍遥七宝之林，仙童玉女侍卫之焉。 太明玉完天音第二 太明玉完天中，有自然之书八字，文曰须延明首法揽菩昙。 天真皇人曰：其八字，飞玄自然之书，字方一丈，文彩焕曜，洞明八方。 元始下教，使撰其字，解其音，合成玉完天中大梵隐语无量之音，以付道君，使教玉完天中宿有仙名者，度应得道人也。 大明须灵会，延侍开玉真。 明道梵玄路，百披入三便。 法轮洞幽辽，揽觉大模新。 菩提御纲运，昙颐自回椿。 天真皇人曰：其章以#1玉完天中合五方飞玄之炁，以和八字自然之音，曰无量洞章。 玉完天去清明何童天八亿万炁。 须延者，玉完天西北阙之号。
chunks.translated_text:
Beginning anew from this moment, may all beings attain the true Dao, and may the great blessings be universally bestowed without partiality. The Heavenly Worthy has decreed, and all heavens reverently comply.

Thereupon, the four assemblies rose as one to bow in homage. Raising their hands, they pointed upward; lowering them, they pointed downward—without above, without below; without limit, without end; without depth, without distance; without darkness, without concealment; without greatness, without smallness; without beginning, without conclusion. All are universally delivered, together receiving radiant illumination. With a snap of the fingers, the assembly was addressed, and all heard.

At that time, the four assemblies simultaneously raised their hands and snapped their fingers toward heaven. The thirty-two heavens, the sun, moon, and stars all shone brightly as one. Beneath the earth, in the nine depths and the boundless abyss, the light penetrated completely, leaving no darkness or obscurity. All that was hidden became visible; Earth Treasury revealed its form. Mountains, rivers, streams, and ravines were all leveled as if stretched smooth. Winter blossoms bore fruit, withered trees flourished anew. Joy spread to all, and merit filled the multitude of beings. Fish and dragons leapt, birds and beasts rejoiced in song. Divine hymns harmonized, and no sorrowful cries were heard upon the paths. Heaven stilled, earth fell silent; the Three Officials withdrew into tranquility, their ledgers and judgments at rest. The Five Paths ceased to arise; humans and spirits rejoiced in peace. The sagely Dao flourished in great harmony.

The Heavenly Perfected Sovereign declared: *"The Inner Sounds of the Heavens, the Spontaneous Jade Characters"*—these are the great Brahmanic hidden words within all heavens, weaving the qi of soaring mystery and harmonizing the sounds of the five directions. They arise above the Primordial Beginning, emerging from the midst of the Empty Cavern. Following the turning of the kalpa, they universally accomplish the work of heaven and earth. This scripture is revered and wondrous, beyond comparison to the ordinary. Thus, at the inception of the Great Existence, the celestial radiance was sealed to treasure the Dao and honor its text. Its characters are profound and subtle, not like the formless writings of heaven. Truly precious are its wondrous symbols, concealing the utmost truth. The marvelous responsive chart follows its ordained course. The Heavenly Worthy did not consider my humble talent but commanded me to elucidate its meaning and convey its jade sounds. The mysterious statutes have their regulations; I dared not disobey the decree. On the day I took up my brush, my form and soul were instantly overwhelmed. Following what I beheld, I humbly annotated its text. Whether right or wrong, I have exhausted my heart’s sincerity. Now that the imperial Dao is illuminated, all heavens rejoice. All that is borne and sustained, the living and the dead, share in this joy. Great blessings universally encompass; my spirit naturally delights. I only wish that the four assemblies may all perceive and embody its clarity.

Thereupon, the perfected deities of the four assemblies as one voiced their approval. From heaven above to heaven below, from earth above to earth below, in the boundless and infinite, throughout the worlds of the Miraculous Net, all spirits without exception modeled their virtue, revering the Great Sage. Rejoicing in the Dao’s revelation, they only wished that the great Dharma would broadly deliver without end, that blessings would flow for kalpas unnumbered, and that the generations would endure forever. Joy and aspiration converged; all universally attained the true Dao, their gratitude boundless.

The four assemblies simultaneously rose as one, bowing in homage and prostrating to receive the decree.

**First Chant of the Supreme Yellow August Once-Heaven**

Within the Supreme Yellow August Once-Heaven, there are eight spontaneous characters, which read: *Dǎn Lóu Ā Huì Wú Hé Guān Yīn*.

The Heavenly Perfected Sovereign declared: These eight characters are the spontaneous writings of soaring mystery, each a *zhang* in breadth, their radiant patterns illuminating the eight directions. The Primordial Beginning descended to teach, commanding the transcription of these characters, the interpretation of their sounds, and the harmonization into the great Brahmanic hidden words of boundless sound within the August Once-Heaven. These were entrusted to the Dao Lord, to instruct those in the August Once-Heaven who bear immortal names, delivering those destined to attain the Dao.

*August Once’s primordial record,*
*Lóu’s capital at the upper realm.*
*Ā Nà resounds with jade chimes,*
*Cāng Xiù’s grace extends afar.*
*From Non-Being, the true arises,*
*Hé’s response bridges the luminous beam.*
*Guān’s awakening illumines the four darknesses,*
*Its tones and rhymes form verses spontaneously.*

The Heavenly Perfected Sovereign declared: This verse harmonizes the qi of soaring mystery from the five directions within the August Once-Heaven with the spontaneous sounds of the eight characters, called the *"Boundless Cavern Verse."*

The August Once-Heaven lies nine billion ninety-nine thousand *qi* from the Supreme Bright Jade Complete Heaven. The *Yuán Jì* marks the farthest reaches of the eight directions and the four维. *Lóu Dū* is the name of the central long tower in heaven, upholding the Supreme Mystery Palace and the Jade Capital Mountain. *Ā Nà*, under the supervision of *Lóu Dū*, governs the reckoning of the six Brahmanic numbers. When these numbers intersect, *Lóu Dū* sounds its drum, and the assembled perfected ascend to court. *Huì Xiù* is the imperial lord’s wandering terrace; *Hé Dá* is the gateway of the sun and moon. Perfected beings ride golden wheels to open the darkness; jade maidens wield floral banners to unfurl the *Guān Jué*, presiding over the records of the long night. The four darknesses extricate the nine depths’ abodes. If one can perform purification rites on the eight solar terms, recite the Cavern Verse to harmonize the soul, then the seven ancestors will be illumined, withered bones will return to the gate, and one will wear the red script of the eight characters, mastering the boundless sounds. They will ascend upon cloud chariots to the carefree groves of the seven treasures, where immortal youths and jade maidens attend them.

**Second Chant of the Supreme Bright Jade Complete Heaven**

Within the Supreme Bright Jade Complete Heaven, there are eight spontaneous characters, which read: *Xū Yán Míng Shǒu Fǎ Lǎn Pú Tán*.

The Heavenly Perfected Sovereign declared: These eight characters are the spontaneous writings of soaring mystery, each a *zhang* in breadth, their radiant patterns illuminating the eight directions. The Primordial Beginning descended to teach, commanding the transcription of these characters, the interpretation of their sounds, and the harmonization into the great Brahmanic hidden words of boundless sound within the Jade Complete Heaven. These were entrusted to the Dao Lord, to instruct those in the Jade Complete Heaven who bear immortal names, delivering those destined to attain the Dao.

*Great brightness gathers at Xū’s numinous assembly,*
*Yán attends to unveil the jade truth.*
*The bright Dao traverses the mysterious Brahmanic path,*
*A hundred unfoldings enter the three conveniences.*
*The Dharma wheel penetrates the distant and obscure,*
*Lǎn’s awakening renews the great model.*
*Bodhi steers the net’s turning,*
*Tán’s countenance revolves like the sunwood.*

The Heavenly Perfected Sovereign declared: This verse harmonizes the qi of soaring mystery from the five directions within the Jade Complete Heaven with the spontaneous sounds of the eight characters, called the *"Boundless Cavern Verse."*

The Jade Complete Heaven lies eight billion ten thousand *qi* from the Clear Bright Harmonious Youth Heaven. *Xū Yán* is the name of the northwest gate of the Jade Complete Heaven.

chunks.original_text: 大劫之交，须延而开，玉真大圣，於是而回。 明道则元始之都，候元始开运。 则都候启道，梵行诸炁，倏欻自朗。 三便则三界之门，能知八字之音，则过三便之上，身登大罗之天。 法轮则罪福之场，揽觉则生死之端。 诵灵音於洞章，则名书於紫宫法轮，列籍於司命揽觉，度魂於更生。 菩昙三元上圣，执九色之麾，菩颐把十绝之婶，上真转九色以轮还，昙颐旋十绝以停轮。 天地得之以无倾，万道得之以长存，神仙诵之以飞空，五岳保之以致安，国祚享之以无穷。 大劫可以保命，生死可以善绿，奉之者延年，修之者飞仙也。 清明何童天音第三 清明何童天中，有自然之书八字，文曰稼那阿奕忽诃流吟。 天真皇人曰：其八字，飞玄自然之书，字方一丈，文彩焕曜，洞明八方。 元始下教，使撰其字，解其音，合成何童天中大梵隐语无量之音，以付道君，使教何童天中宿有仙名者，度应得道人也。 清明稼禄滋，那径返龙山。 阿秀玉林条，奕奕四垂骞。 忽觉灵劫化，诃摩以敷晨。 流真三界庭，吟啸来运懃。 天真皇人曰：其章以#2何童天中合五方飞玄之炁，以和八字自然之音，曰无量洞章。 何童天去玄胎平育天七亿万炁。 稼那者，天中玉图先生，治金华之宫，与龙山连字，伟灿玉清之上郁勃洞虚之中。 领人生死图录，总主神仙。 阿奕则七宝林中树名，弥覆四方上圣之游圃，真人之戏园忽觉。 元始，飞天神人也，主大小劫会。 诃摩，无名之号。 劫运既终，诃摩则以开冥敷法教，普度天人。 是时欢乐，道教流行，天度炁促，人道转丧，末运破坏，故为流吟。 万劫种善，宿有玄名，得遇天音，修诵洞章，玉图先生则消罪录於长夜，注名南极长生之宫。 七祖被幽而更始，死户更华琳琅之方，因缘不绝，世世为仙王也。 玄胎平育天音第四 玄胎平育天中，有自然之书八字，文曰华都曲丽鲜菩育臻。 天真皇人曰：其八字，飞玄自然之书，字方一丈，文彩焕曜，洞明八方。 元始下教，使撰其字，解其音，合成平育天中大梵隐语无量之音，以付道君，使教平育天中宿有仙名者，度应得道人也。 华都秀东宫，都梵飞天歌。 曲爽澄虚漠，丽宛从空和。 鲜云荫灵宇，菩娄迓参差。 育王乘景输，臻是鬼神家。 天真皇人曰：其章以平育天中合五方飞玄之炁，以和八字自然之音，曰无量洞章。 平育天去元明文举天六亿万炁。 华都，则天中太乙宫青华门之别名。 上有梵天神人，飞游太极之上，玄歌无量洞章，曲爽灵风之气，恒拂扬洞章之曲。 丽宛，太和玉女也。 於华都之门，而和神人之歌。 鲜云者，则庆云之舒敷，以散八音之上。 平育，天帝之隐名，常乘八景之轮，游观太极之外，回十绝之幡，以召大魔之王。 平育，天音，众真所崇诵之者，飞天遥唱，佩其文，三界伺迎，七祖出长夜，上升南宫，轮转化生，世为王门。 仙童玉女，侍卫身形，道成飞行，上升平育天。 元明文举天音第五 元明文举天中，有自然之书八字，文曰答落大梵散烟庆云。 天真皇人曰：其八字，飞玄自然之书，字方一丈，文彩焕曜，洞明八方。 元始下教，使撰其字，解其音，合成文举天中大梵隐语无量之音，以付道君，使教文举天中宿有仙名者，度应得道人也。
chunks.translated_text:
At the turning of the great kalpa, Xū Yán opens the gate,
The Jade Perfected Sovereign thus returns.
The bright Dao is the capital of the Primordial Beginning—
awaiting the Primordial Beginning’s unfolding of the kalpa.
When the capital awaits the activation of the Dao,
the Brahmanic qi of all practices suddenly shines forth.

The Three Conveniences are the gates of the Three Realms.
Those who know the sound of the eight characters
ascend beyond the Three Conveniences,
their bodies ascending to the Great Lofty Heaven.
The Dharma Wheel is the field of sin and fortune,
while Lǎn’s awakening is the threshold of life and death.
Reciting the numinous sound of the Cavern Verse,
one’s name is inscribed in the Purple Palace’s Dharma Wheel,
registered in the Bureau of Destiny’s Lǎn’s Awakening,
and souls are delivered to rebirth.

The Three Primordial Upper Saints of Bodhi and Tán
grasp the nine-colored banners,
while Tán’s countenance holds the ten absolute pennants.
The Upper Perfected revolve the nine colors to return the wheel,
and Tán’s countenance rotates the ten absolutes to halt the wheel.
Heaven and Earth thereby avoid collapse,
the myriad Dao endure forever,
immortals recite it to soar through the void,
the Five Peaks preserve it to attain peace,
and the nation’s destiny enjoys it without end.
The great kalpa may thus preserve life,
life and death may be favorably resolved.
Those who uphold it extend their years,
those who cultivate it ascend as flying immortals.

---

**Third Verse: The Clear Bright Harmonious Youth Heaven**

Within the Clear Bright Harmonious Youth Heaven,
there exists a spontaneous script of eight characters,
whose text reads: *Jià nà ā yì hū jué hē liú yín*.
The Heavenly Perfected Sovereign declared:
These eight characters are the spontaneous script of soaring mystery,
each a *zhang* in breadth, their radiant patterns illuminating the eight directions.
The Primordial Beginning descended to teach,
commanding the transcription of these characters,
the deciphering of their sounds,
and their harmonization into the great Brahmanic esoteric speech of the Harmonious Youth Heaven—
the *"Boundless Cavern Verse"*—
to be entrusted to the Dao Lord,
who instructs those in the Harmonious Youth Heaven
with immortal names to deliver the destined.

*Clear brightness ripens the harvest of blessings,*
*That path returns to Dragon Mountain.*
*Ā Xiù’s jade grove spreads its branches,*
*Luminous, the four quarters unfurl.*
*Suddenly awakened to the numinous kalpa’s transformation,*
*He-mó spreads the dawn.*
*The flowing truth enters the Three Realms’ court,*
*Chanting and whistling, it comes with diligent motion.*

The Heavenly Perfected Sovereign declared:
This verse harmonizes the qi of soaring mystery from the five directions within the Harmonious Youth Heaven
with the spontaneous sounds of the eight characters,
called the *"Boundless Cavern Verse."*
The Harmonious Youth Heaven lies seven billion ten thousand *qi* from the Mysterious Womb Nurturing Heaven.
*Jià nà* is the name of the Heavenly Jade Chart Master,
who governs the Golden Flower Palace,
connected in script to Dragon Mountain,
resplendent above the Jade Clarity,
flourishing within the vibrant emptiness of the Cavern.
He oversees the records of life and death,
presiding over all immortals.
*Ā yì* is the name of a tree in the Seven Treasures Grove,
its canopy shading the gardens where Upper Saints wander,
the playgrounds where Perfected Ones sport—
a sudden awakening.

The Primordial Beginning is a flying celestial,
who governs the great and minor kalpas.
*He-mó* is the title of the Nameless One.
When the kalpa’s destiny reaches its end,
*He-mó* opens the darkness to spread the Dharma’s teachings,
universally delivering celestials and humans.
At that time, joy abounds,
the Dao’s teachings flow,
the celestial kalpa’s qi hastens,
the human realm declines,
the final destiny collapses—
hence the *"flowing chant."*
Those who plant goodness across ten thousand kalpas,
who bear immortal names from former lives,
encounter the Heavenly Sound,
cultivate and recite the Cavern Verse—
the Jade Chart Master erases their sins from the eternal night,
inscribes their names in the Southern Culmen’s Palace of Longevity.
Their seven ancestors, long confined, are reborn,
the gates of death transform into the realm of *huálínláng*,
causal connections unbroken,
lifetimes become immortal kings.

---

**Fourth Verse: The Mysterious Womb Nurturing Heaven**

Within the Mysterious Womb Nurturing Heaven,
there exists a spontaneous script of eight characters,
whose text reads: *Huá dū qū lì xiān pú yù zhēn*.
The Heavenly Perfected Sovereign declared:
These eight characters are the spontaneous script of soaring mystery,
each a *zhang* in breadth, their radiant patterns illuminating the eight directions.
The Primordial Beginning descended to teach,
commanding the transcription of these characters,
the deciphering of their sounds,
and their harmonization into the great Brahmanic esoteric speech of the Nurturing Heaven—
the *"Boundless Cavern Verse"*—
to be entrusted to the Dao Lord,
who instructs those in the Nurturing Heaven
with immortal names to deliver the destined.

*The Flower Capital graces the Eastern Palace,*
*The Capital’s Brahmanic hymns soar as celestial songs.*
*Curved clarity purifies the vast emptiness,*
*Luminous grace follows the harmony of the void.*
*Fresh clouds shade the numinous abode,*
*Bodhi’s tiers greet the uneven heights.*
*The Nurturing King rides the radiant chariot,*
*Arriving at the domain of ghosts and spirits.*

The Heavenly Perfected Sovereign declared:
This verse harmonizes the qi of soaring mystery from the five directions within the Nurturing Heaven
with the spontaneous sounds of the eight characters,
called the *"Boundless Cavern Verse."*
The Nurturing Heaven lies six billion ten thousand *qi* from the Primordial Brightness Literary Flourishing Heaven.
*Huá dū* is another name for the Heavenly Supreme Unity Palace’s Azure Flower Gate.
Above it, Brahmanic celestials fly and wander beyond the Supreme Ultimate,
eternally singing the *"Boundless Cavern Verse,"*
the qi of the *qū shuǎng* numinous wind
perpetually wafting the melody of the Cavern’s verse.
*Lì wǎn* is the Jade Maiden of Supreme Harmony,
who, at the Flower Capital’s gate,
harmonizes with the celestial songs.
*Xiān yún* is the unfolding of auspicious clouds,
dispersing above the eight sounds.
*Píng yù* is the hidden name of the Heavenly Emperor,
who constantly rides the eight-scene chariot,
roaming beyond the Supreme Ultimate,
revolving the ten absolute pennants
to summon the kings of great demons.
*Píng yù*—the Heavenly Sound—
is reverently recited by all Perfected Ones.
Flying celestials chant it from afar,
adorned with its script,
the Three Realms await its arrival,
the seven ancestors emerge from eternal night,
ascend to the Southern Palace,
the wheel turns to transform rebirth,
lifetimes become royal lineages.
Immortal youths and jade maidens
attend and guard their forms,
the Dao perfected, they ascend in flight
to the Nurturing Heaven.

---

**Fifth Verse: The Primordial Brightness Literary Flourishing Heaven**

Within the Primordial Brightness Literary Flourishing Heaven,
there exists a spontaneous script of eight characters,
whose text reads: *Dá luò dà fàn sàn yān qìng yún*.
The Heavenly Perfected Sovereign declared:
These eight characters are the spontaneous script of soaring mystery,
each a *zhang* in breadth, their radiant patterns illuminating the eight directions.
The Primordial Beginning descended to teach,
commanding the transcription of these characters,
the deciphering of their sounds,
and their harmonization into the great Brahmanic esoteric speech of the Literary Flourishing Heaven—
the *"Boundless Cavern Verse"*—
to be entrusted to the Dao Lord,
who instructs those in the Literary Flourishing Heaven
with immortal names to deliver the destined.

chunks.original_text: 文举答和阙，落落冠三门。 大有开龙汉，梵天敷景云。 散馥延霄阶，氤氲自生华。 灵风流返香，云上舞空轮。 天真皇人曰：其章以文举天中合五方飞玄之炁，以和八字自然之音，曰无量洞章。 文举天去摩夷天五亿万炁。 答和者，天中之玉阙，以界三便之门。 大梵既行，元炁通明者也。 故龙汉推数而自开、赤明待运而敷晨，真人散香於玉庭，氤氲扬熏，以拂真庆云，栖乎紫馆，飞天舞乎空轮，庆大宥於元始，欣八字於自然，明玄文以度众，音洞章以成仙。 奉之者脱苦，修之者成真，七祖同欢，世生仙门也。 上明七曜摩夷天音第六 七曜摩夷天中，有自然之书八字，文曰飞洒玉都明魔上门。 天真皇人曰：其八字，飞玄自然之书，字方一丈，文彩焕曜，洞明八方。 元始下教，使撰其字，解其音，合成摩夷天中大梵隐语无量之音，以付道君，使教摩夷天中宿有仙名者，度应得道人也。 上明飞延康，洒都出龙汉。 玉真开玄夜，酆都度八难。 明道结空章，魔王稽首赞。 上有始生人，门下典录算。 天真皇人曰：其章以摩夷天中合五方飞玄之炁，以和八字自然之音，曰无量洞章。 摩夷天去越衡天四亿万炁。 飞者，飞天神人之号。 天地改运，沦於延康，冥冥无开，飞天启光於散辉，诸天受炁，洒虚玄都。 龙汉一会，二倏欻四回。 而玉真者，大圣之号。 都有九幽之酆都，人有善功，则大圣开玄夜之户，酆都度八难之场。 七祖於是而返还，幽魂於是而光明，道则八字而开洞章，度死魂而还康。 神魔於是而伏，五云玄哺为粮，上帝育养始生之神，门下韩君司录度算於南宫。 自非前生万劫宿有善名者，莫得盻其篇目，参此洞章。 奉之者福流九族，生死蒙恩。 修之者身生水火，白日登晨也。 虚无越衡天音第七 虚无越衡天中，有自然之书八字，文曰无行上首回跋流玄。 天真皇人曰：其八字，飞玄自然之书，字方一丈，文彩焕曜，洞明八方。 元始下教，使撰其字，解其音，合成越衡天中大梵隐语无量之音，以付道君，使教越衡天中宿有仙名者，度应得道人也。 七曜无上道，行纲梵玄机。 上转天一关，首运倏欻开。 回灵非始驾，跖起入空飞。 流晨制长夜，玄楼自然归。 天真皇人曰：其章以越衡天中合五方飞玄之炁，以和八字，自然之音，曰无量洞章。 越衡天去蒙翳天三亿万炁。 无者，元始之炁。 开明无上之道。 行者，元元之纲纪，维罗八极。 上首者，北斗四非之宫也。 运转天关，推会度数，天数极则大劫交运，回跖跋五篇真文之化，乘大运之终而五篇明焉。 空无而出、天地自开，人有善功，宿名玄都、即拔长夜，实出九幽，更生善门，长离玄阴，生死福中。 越衡天上都之京有空峰之山，乃万圣之所游，生死之所归。 学洞玄之道，道成得仙，径升空峰之上，受号而腾空也。 道未备足，身应灭度、魂升空峰，受炼而度南宫也。 越衡之旨，理极於此矣。 太极蒙翳天音第八 太极蒙翳天中，有自然之书八字，文曰阿跎龙罗四象吁员。 天真皇人曰：其入字，飞玄自然之书，字方一丈，文采换曜，洞明八方。 元始下教，使撰其字，解其音，合成蒙翳天中大梵隐语无量之音，以付道君，使教蒙翳天中宿有仙名者，度应得道人也。 蒙翳阿僧岭，陀丘交灵势。
chunks.translated_text:
**The Literary Flourishing Harmony Gate**

The Literary Flourishing Harmony Gate stands aloft,
its towering heights crowning the Three Portals.
The Great Possession unfolds in the Dragon-Han,
the Brahmā Heaven spreads its radiant clouds.
Fragrance scatters, ascending the celestial steps,
mist and haze spontaneously bloom into splendor.
A numinous wind carries returning incense,
while above, the empty wheel dances in the clouds.

The Heavenly Perfected Sovereign declared:
This verse harmonizes the five-directional soaring mystery *qi* of the Literary Flourishing Heaven
with the spontaneous sounds of the eight characters—
the *"Boundless Cavern Verse."*
The Literary Flourishing Heaven lies five hundred million *qi* from the Māyā Heaven.
The Harmony Gate is the jade palace within the heavens,
demarcating the Three Convenient Portals.
When the Great Brahmā moves, the primordial *qi* becomes luminous.
Thus, the Dragon-Han reckons its cycles and unfolds of itself,
while the Crimson Brightness awaits its turn to spread the dawn.
True persons scatter incense in the jade court,
mist and haze waft their fragrance,
brushing the true celebratory clouds to rest in the Purple Chamber.
The flying heavens dance in the empty wheel,
celebrating the great amnesty of the Primordial Beginning,
rejoicing in the eight characters of spontaneity.
The luminous mystery script delivers the multitudes,
while the sounds of the Cavern Verse perfect immortality.
Those who uphold it escape suffering;
those who cultivate it attain perfection.
Seven generations of ancestors share in the joy,
and the world gives birth to the gates of immortality.

---

**The Seventh Luminary Māyā Heaven**

Within the Seventh Luminary Māyā Heaven,
there exists a spontaneous script of eight characters,
whose text reads: *Fēi sǎ yù dū míng mó shàng mén*.
The Heavenly Perfected Sovereign declared:
These eight characters are the spontaneous script of soaring mystery,
each a *zhang* in breadth, their radiant patterns illuminating the eight directions.
The Primordial Beginning descended to teach,
commanding the transcription of these characters,
the deciphering of their sounds,
and their harmonization into the great Brahmanic esoteric speech of the Māyā Heaven—
the *"Boundless Cavern Verse"*—
to be entrusted to the Dao Lord,
who instructs those in the Māyā Heaven
with immortal names to deliver the destined.

**The Soaring Prolonged Peace, the Scattered Capital Emerges from the Dragon-Han.**
**The Jade Perfected Opens the Mystery Night, the Fengdu Delivers from Eight Perils.**
**The Luminous Dao Weaves the Empty Verse, the Demon Kings Bow in Reverence.**
**Above dwell the Firstborn, below the Gatekeepers Record the Accounts.**

The Heavenly Perfected Sovereign declared:
This verse harmonizes the five-directional soaring mystery *qi* of the Māyā Heaven
with the spontaneous sounds of the eight characters—
the *"Boundless Cavern Verse."*
The Māyā Heaven lies four hundred million *qi* from the Yuheng Heaven.
*Fēi* is the title of the flying heavenly divine persons.
When heaven and earth alter their course,
sinking into prolonged peace,
the darkness yields no opening.
The flying heavens kindle light in scattered radiance,
and all heavens receive *qi* in the Scattered Mystery Capital.
One assembly of the Dragon-Han spans two swift transformations and four revolutions.
The Jade Perfected is the title of the Great Sage.
Within the nine nether realms lies Fengdu,
where those with meritorious deeds
have the Great Sage open the gates of the Mystery Night,
delivering them from the trials of the Eight Perils.
Seven generations of ancestors thus return,
and lost souls gain illumination.
The Dao opens the Cavern Verse through the eight characters,
delivering the dead to renewed peace.
Spirits and demons submit in reverence,
while the five clouds of mystery nourish as sustenance.
The Celestial Thearch nurtures the firstborn spirits,
and the Gatekeeper Han Lord records the accounts in the Southern Palace.
Only those with preordained virtuous names from ten thousand kalpas prior
may glimpse its passages and partake in this Cavern Verse.
Those who uphold it bring fortune to nine clans,
and both the living and the dead receive grace.
Those who cultivate it traverse water and fire,
ascending in broad daylight to the dawn.

---

**The Void Transcendent Yuheng Heaven**

Within the Void Transcendent Yuheng Heaven,
there exists a spontaneous script of eight characters,
whose text reads: *Wú xíng shàng shǒu huí bá liú xuán*.
The Heavenly Perfected Sovereign declared:
These eight characters are the spontaneous script of soaring mystery,
each a *zhang* in breadth, their radiant patterns illuminating the eight directions.
The Primordial Beginning descended to teach,
commanding the transcription of these characters,
the deciphering of their sounds,
and their harmonization into the great Brahmanic esoteric speech of the Yuheng Heaven—
the *"Boundless Cavern Verse"*—
to be entrusted to the Dao Lord,
who instructs those in the Yuheng Heaven
with immortal names to deliver the destined.

**The Seven Luminaries Uphold the Supreme Dao,**
**the Net of Conduct Braids the Mystery Mechanism.**
**Above, the Celestial One’s Gate Turns,**
**the First Motion Swiftly Unfolds.**
**The Returning Spirit is Not the Primal Chariot,**
**the Heel Rises to Soar in the Void.**
**The Flowing Dawn Governs the Long Night,**
**the Mystery Tower Returns of Itself.**

The Heavenly Perfected Sovereign declared:
This verse harmonizes the five-directional soaring mystery *qi* of the Yuheng Heaven
with the spontaneous sounds of the eight characters—
the *"Boundless Cavern Verse."*
The Yuheng Heaven lies three hundred million *qi* from the Obscured Heaven.
*Wú* is the *qi* of the Primordial Beginning,
opening the luminous path of the Supreme Dao.
*Xíng* is the fundamental net of conduct,
encompassing the eight directions.
*Shàng shǒu* is the palace of the Four Non-Existent in the Northern Dipper.
The Celestial Gate turns, reckoning the cycles of time.
When the celestial reckoning reaches its limit, the great kalpa shifts.
The transformations of the Five Realized Scriptures return,
riding the end of the great cycle to illuminate the Five Scriptures.
Emerging from the void, heaven and earth open of themselves.
Those with meritorious deeds and preordained names in the Mystery Capital
are plucked from the long night,
truly escaping the nine nether realms,
reborn into the gates of goodness,
eternally freed from the dark yin,
dwelling in the blessings of life and death.
Above the capital of the Yuheng Heaven lies the Empty Peak Mountain,
the realm where ten thousand sages wander,
the destination of life and death.
Those who study the Cavern Mystery Dao,
upon attaining perfection, ascend directly to the Empty Peak,
receiving their title and soaring into the void.
If the Dao is not yet fully cultivated when the body perishes,
the soul ascends to the Empty Peak,
undergoes refinement, and is delivered to the Southern Palace.
The essence of the Yuheng Heaven culminates in this principle.

---

chunks.original_text: 龙阜立空峙，罗映曜云袂。 四宫生真景，象论梵三界。 吁育炼朽魂，员童度生契。 天真皇人曰：其章以蒙翳天中合五方飞玄之炁，以和八字自然之音，曰无量洞章。 蒙翳天去赤明和阳天二亿万炁。 阿者，天中有九折之山连阿相属。 陀者，山上之楼上通玉清之炁，八望三界之乡。 帝君乘三素之云，驾九龙之舆，上游阿丘之岭，下监万生之罪福。 龙者，龙山与阿陀相去九亿万里，山势相交，日月朋於二山，故罗瑛曜云也，皆日月之名。 四者，四极之宫，中有四极真人，主人命籍。 真人常驾象轮之车、远行三界之中，校人生死罪录，开度学道之人。 佩此文，诵咏洞章，则三界之官皆条名，列言九幽，削於地籍，长夜拔出魂，玉名入於帝簿，生死度於南宫。 吁员则长生官中度命之君，得入南宫，吁员即炼度於朽魂。 员童，日中之生童，即灌其津，着生契於四极，洽自然之羽章，七祖欢於福堂，延年万岁，世生仙王，身度三恶之道，过度八难之场，三界稽首而侍卫，五帝肃然而奉迎。 其八天分属东方始青之炁，炁炁相生，弥罗八极，故天有八音，皆八会之炁，结而成章也。 元始天尊告太上道君曰：赤明始开其八天之炁，分度并属东方青天。 天有八字，合六十四音，皆天中大梵隐语，无量之音。 行九炁天君之道，当佩其音，诵其章，出入游行，当叩齿九通，思九色之龙，导从前后，青云九重，覆匝身形，密咒曰： 赤明开图，八炁回真。 总统玄关，。 帝大神。 流化九天，缠绵我身。 灵音八皇。 六十四篇。 开明天地，与我合仙。 运致龙驾，上升帝轩。 毕，引炁九咽止。 行之九年，八天各以青腰玉女、青华玉童各八人，侍卫身形，致青芽九炁之精，生身光明：彻见虚无。 万徧道成，即得飞行。 其道尊法弘教，普度无穷，七祖同福，皆升南宫。 九年并得更生善门之中，勤为护度，谛受勿忘。 道君稽一首，奉受命旨。 赤明和阳天音第一 赤明和阳天中，有自然之书八字，文曰南阎洞浮玉眸诜诜。 天真皇人曰：其八字，飞玄自然之书，字方一丈，文彩焕曜，洞明八方。 元始下教，使撰其字，解其音，合成和阳天中大梵一隐语无量之音，以付道君，使教和阳天中宿有仙名者，度应得道人也。 赤明南上炁，阎光流八精。 洞门吐丹晖，孚景自高明。 玉泽充绛府，眸华乘运征。 洗垢澄虚漠，说谈步三灵。 天真皇人曰：其章以和阳天中合五方飞玄之炁，以和八字自然之音，曰无量洞章。 和阳天去玄明恭华天九千万炁。 南阎者，和阳天中有流火之庭，爓光焕乎八方。 洞浮者则洞阳之宫，南极真人治於宫中。 诸是学人，始得道者，皆诣流火之庭，受炼而成真，然后而得进入洞阳之宫。 玉眸，流火之膏也。 既受火炼，体生玉光，绛府充溢，万神并归，侍卫身形，辅翼羽衣，位登上真，游宴紫微。 道业未备，运应灭度，魂经洞阳则受炼而洗，尘埃澄荡，早还更生，轮转三界，无有挂碍。 故诜诜步三灵也。 自无前生万劫宿有善缘，不得盻其音章。 玄明恭华天音第二 玄明恭华天中，有自然之音八字，日梵形落空九灵推前。 天真皇人曰： 其八字，飞玄自然之书，字方一丈，文彩焕曜，洞明八方。 元始下教，使撰其字，解其音，合成恭华天中大梵隐语无量之音，以付道君，使教恭华天中宿有仙名者，度应得道人也。

At Dragon Mound, standing in empty heights,
Luo’s radiance illumines the cloud-sleeved sky.
The Four Palaces engender true visions,
their discourse on symbols pervades the Three Realms.
*Xū* nurtures and refines the decayed souls,
*Yuán* lads deliver the covenant of life.

The Heavenly Perfected Sovereign declared:
This chapter blends the five-directional soaring mystery *qi* of the Obscured Heaven
with the spontaneous sounds of the eight characters,
called the *"Boundless Cavern Verse."*
The Obscured Heaven lies two hundred million *qi* from the Crimson Clarity Harmonious Yang Heaven.

*Ā* denotes the nine-fold mountain range within the heavens, linked in continuous succession.
*Dāra* signifies the tower upon the mountain, its summit connecting to the Jade Clarity *qi*,
gazing across the Three Realms’ domains.
The Thearch mounts clouds of threefold purity,
rides a chariot drawn by nine dragons,
ascends the ridges of Ā Hill,
and surveys the karmic fortunes of all beings below.

*Lóng* refers to Dragon Mountain, nine hundred million *li* from Ā-Dāra,
where the ranges intertwine, and sun and moon converge between the two peaks—
hence the radiant Luo jade illumines the clouds, both names of sun and moon.
*Four* signifies the Four Ultimate Palaces,
wherein dwell the Four Ultimate Perfected, keepers of life’s registers.
They ever ride chariots of elephant wheels,
traversing the Three Realms to audit the ledgers of life and death,
liberating those who study the Dao.
Whoever bears this scripture and recites the *Boundless Cavern Verse*
shall have their names itemized by the officials of the Three Realms,
enumerated in the Nine Darks,
erased from the earthly register,
their souls delivered from eternal night,
their jade names inscribed in the Thearch’s annals,
their lives and deaths transcended in the Southern Palace.

*Xū-Yuán* are the Lords of Life-Deliverance in the Palace of Longevity,
who enter the Southern Palace,
refining and delivering decayed souls.
*Yuán* lads are the life-lads born of the sun,
who anoint their essences,
inscribe the covenant of life in the Four Ultimates,
harmonize with the spontaneous feathered regalia,
where seven generations rejoice in the Hall of Blessings,
prolonging life for ten thousand years,
giving rise to generations of immortal kings.
The body transcends the Three Evil Paths,
passes through the Eight Perilous Realms,
the Three Realms bow in attendance,
the Five Thearchs reverently welcome.
These eight heavens pertain to the east’s Primordial Azure *qi*,
each *qi* generating the next, filling the Eight Ultimates—
thus the heavens possess eight sounds,
all formed from the *qi* of the Eight Convergences, coalescing into verse.

The Primordial Heavenly Venerable addressed the Supreme Dao Lord:
When Crimson Clarity first opened, its eight heavens’ *qi*
were apportioned and assigned to the Eastern Azure Heaven.
The heavens possess eight characters, combining into sixty-four sounds,
all the great Brahmanic esoteric speech of the heavens—
the boundless sounds.
Those who practice the Way of the Nine *Qi* Heavenly Lords
should bear these sounds, recite this verse,
and when entering or exiting, traveling or wandering,
strike the teeth nine times,
meditate on the nine-colored dragons leading before and behind,
with nine layers of azure clouds enveloping the body.
The secret incantation reads:

*Crimson Clarity unfolds the chart,*
*eight qi return to the true.*
*Govern the Mysterious Pass,*
*Great Thearch Divine.*
*Flowing transformation through the Nine Heavens,*
*entwining my form.*
*Numen-sounds of the Eight August Ones,*
*sixty-four stanzas.*
*Illuminating heaven and earth,*
*uniting with me as immortal.*
*Summoning the dragon-chariot,*
*ascending the Thearch’s hall.*

Conclude by drawing *qi* nine times and swallowing.
Practicing this for nine years,
each of the eight heavens shall dispatch eight Azure-Waisted Jade Maidens
and eight Azure-Flower Jade Lads to attend the body,
bestowing the essence of nine azure sprouts’ *qi*,
illuminating the body’s radiance to penetrate the Void.
After ten thousand cycles, the Dao is accomplished,
and one gains the power of flight.
This Way is revered, its teachings vast,
universally delivering the boundless.
Seven generations share its blessings,
all ascending to the Southern Palace.
After nine years, one is reborn within the Gate of Goodness,
diligently safeguarding and delivering—
receive this with sincerity and never forget.

The Dao Lord bowed once and received the decree.

**The Crimson Clarity Harmonious Yang Heaven, First Scripture**
Within the Crimson Clarity Harmonious Yang Heaven,
there exists a spontaneous script of eight characters,
whose text reads: *Nán yán dòng fú yù móu shēn shēn*.
The Heavenly Perfected Sovereign declared:
These eight characters are the spontaneous script of soaring mystery,
each a *zhang* in breadth, their radiant patterns illuminating the eight directions.
The Primordial Beginning descended to teach,
commanding the transcription of these characters,
the deciphering of their sounds,
and their harmonization into the great Brahmanic esoteric speech of the Harmonious Yang Heaven—
the *"Boundless Cavern Verse"*—
to be entrusted to the Dao Lord,
who instructs those in the Harmonious Yang Heaven
with immortal names to deliver the destined.

**The Crimson Azure ascends in the south,**
**Yán’s light flows with eightfold essence.**
**The Cavern Gate exhales cinnabar radiance,**
**its trustworthy splendor naturally sublime.**
**Jade moisture fills the Crimson Palace,**
**pupil-splendor rides the course of destiny.**
**Washing defilements to clarify the Void,**
**expounding and discoursing, pacing the Three Numinous.**

The Heavenly Perfected Sovereign declared:
This chapter blends the five-directional soaring mystery *qi* of the Harmonious Yang Heaven
with the spontaneous sounds of the eight characters,
called the *"Boundless Cavern Verse."*
The Harmonious Yang Heaven lies ninety million *qi* from the Mysterious Clarity Reverent Florescence Heaven.

*Nán yán* denotes the Flowing Fire Courtyard within the Harmonious Yang Heaven,
its scorching light blazing across the eight directions.
*Dòng fú* signifies the Cavern Yang Palace,
where the Southern Ultimate Perfected governs.
All who study the Dao,
upon first attaining the Way,
must visit the Flowing Fire Courtyard to undergo refinement and become perfected,
only then may they enter the Cavern Yang Palace.
*Yù móu* is the essence of the Flowing Fire.
Having undergone fire-refinement, the body generates jade radiance,
filling the Crimson Palace, with all spirits converging,
attending the body, assisting with feathered robes—
ascending to the rank of Upper Perfected,
roaming and feasting in the Purple Tenuity.
If the Dao’s work is incomplete and the time of transcendence arrives,
the soul passes through the Cavern Yang to be refined and cleansed,
dust and grime purged,
quickly reborn to revolve through the Three Realms without hindrance.
Thus, *shēn shēn* paces the Three Numinous.
Without prior lifetimes’ myriad kalpas of accumulated good affinity,
one cannot glimpse its sounds and verses.

**The Mysterious Clarity Reverent Florescence Heaven, Second Scripture**
Within the Mysterious Clarity Reverent Florescence Heaven,
there exists a spontaneous script of eight characters,
whose text reads: *Fàn xíng luò kōng jiǔ líng tuī qián*.
The Heavenly Perfected Sovereign declared:
These eight characters are the spontaneous script of soaring mystery,
each a *zhang* in breadth, their radiant patterns illuminating the eight directions.
The Primordial Beginning descended to teach,
commanding the transcription of these characters,
the deciphering of their sounds,
and their harmonization into the great Brahmanic esoteric speech of the Reverent Florescence Heaven—
the *"Boundless Cavern Verse"*—
to be entrusted to the Dao Lord,
who instructs those in the Reverent Florescence Heaven
with immortal names to deliver the destined.

chunks.original_text: 上真梵元始，形化观妙音。 落景随运回，空中赞琼林。 九玄导明首，灵童生朽心。 推元拔夜领，前魂飞霄吟。 天真皇人曰：其章以恭华天中合五方飞玄之炁，以和八字自然之音，曰无量洞章。 恭华天去宗飘天八千万一炁。 梵形者，元始天尊也。 开龙汉之劫，登赤明之运，号曰元始，上皇开运，号元始丈人，随世化生，故以一神。 落空者，元始空中而出，既有天地，日月三光，而知空中有真文也。 灵者，九华真人治於南上宫中，主九幽之下宿对死魂推。 推前者，推算生死功德，人有善功，三官列言，九灵即命主录算其功，拔出九幽七祖之魂，魂神披散，升上南宫，欢乐自然，飞霄歌吟。 天中有散华之台，四斗真人所处焉。 台下有三宝之林，元始书洞章於林中。 四斗真人书迎延之符於台轩，得佩上天之音，真人克受迎延之符，得见迎延之符，逍遥恭华之台。 此符使人项负宝曜，体映玉光，气合三素，灵洞太空，恭华之音，理妙自然也。 曜明宗飘天音第三 曜明宗飘天中，有自然之书八字，文曰泽洛菩台绿罗大千。 天真皇人曰：其八字，飞玄自然之书，字方一丈，文彩焕曜，洞明八方。 元始下教，使撰其字，解其音，合成宗飘天中大梵隐语无量之音，以付道君，使教宗飘天中宿有仙名者，度应得道人也。 曜明泽龙阶，洛觉幽中悦。 菩题亿万众，台上三万日。 绿被飞青衣，罗英秀玉质。 大罗元上色，千劫同一秩。 天真皇人曰：其章以宗飘天中合五方飞玄之炁以和八字自然之音，曰无量洞章。 宗飘天去皇笳天七千万炁。 泽者，天中山名。 其山上众龙所崛，山有黄房之室，一名玉客之台。 洛觉者，真晨道君之内名，治於黄房之中，混大劫而不终，经龙汉而更明，故幽中而悦焉。 菩题者，飞天真人之隐号，有无数之众，飞於玉台之上。 玉台处於泽山之阳，三万日月明其左右。 罗映则日月天人之内名，治在日月之宫，上乘大罗之天梵行之炁，运六度之关，以应天地之数。 数之欲终，大劫交会，大劫既交，诸天日月会於玉台也。 大千世界之分，天地改易，大千同一而存焉。 人佩诸天之音，诵诸天之章，则得驾陵羽之车上升黄房之室，玉台之上也。 竺落皇笳天音第四 竺落皇笳天中，有自然之书八字，文日眇莽九丑韶谣缘邅。 天真皇人日：其八字，飞玄自然之书，字方一丈，文彩焕曜，洞明八方。 元始下教，使撰其字，解其音，合成皇笳天中大梵隐语无量之音，以付道君，使教皇笳天中宿有仙名者，度应得道人也。 竺落眇眇化，莽莽龙汉初。 九道并恶元，丑鬼不生躯。 韶爽元中纵，谣歌乱太虚。 绿纲整三炁，邅值罗天衢。 天真皇人曰：其章以皇笳天中合五方飞玄之炁，以和八字自然之音，曰无量洞章。 皇笳天去堂曜天六千万炁。 眇眇者，元始沦於延康之中天，书玉字翳而不彰，龙汉开运，其文莽莽。 世遇道真，男女并皆寿三万六千岁。 其运之极，又经一劫，九炁各生兽以害恶民，其劫既开后，而九兽改号为九丑之鬼。 北帝上真主生死图录，故立九丑以辅三官，数极九九八十一万，度天炁之反九丑，当得转号为九都使者也。 韶者，皇笳天中神霄王之内名。 神霄王，魔王之主，常试学道之人学正与不正。

**The Supreme Perfected’s Brahmanic Primordial Beginning**
transforms in form to contemplate the wondrous tones.
Falling radiance follows the turning of the kalpa,
in empty space they praise the jade grove.
The Nine Mysteries guide the luminous head,
the numinous youths awaken the withered heart.
Pushing forth the primordial, they pluck the night’s guide,
the former souls soar and chant in the heavens.

The Heavenly Perfected Sovereign declared:
This verse harmonizes the five directions’ soaring mystery *qi*
with the eight characters’ spontaneous tones in the Reverent Florescence Heaven—
called the *"Boundless Cavern Verse."*
The Reverent Florescence Heaven lies eight thousand myriad *qi* from the Ancestral Florescence Heaven.

*"Brahmanic Form"* refers to the Primordial Heavenly Worthy.
At the dawn of the Dragon Han kalpa,
ascending the Crimson Clarity’s turning,
he was named *Primordial Beginning*.
When the Highest Sovereign inaugurated the kalpa,
he was called *Primordial Elder*,
transforming and manifesting through the ages—
thus embodied as a single spirit.

*"Falling into Emptiness"* means the Primordial Beginning emerged from the void.
Once Heaven and Earth existed,
with the sun, moon, and three luminaries,
the true script within emptiness was known.

*"Numinous"* refers to the Ninefold Splendor Perfected,
who governs the Southern Upper Palace,
presiding over the nine glooms below to tally the dead souls’ reckoning.

*"Pushing Forth"* means calculating life and death merits.
If one possesses good deeds,
the Three Officials record them,
and the Nine Numinous Ones command the tallying of merits,
plucking the souls of the seven generations from the nine glooms.
The souls’ spirits disperse,
ascending to the Southern Palace,
where joy arises spontaneously,
and they soar, chanting in the heavens.

Within the heavens stands the Scattered Blossoms Terrace,
where the Four Dipper Perfected reside.
Beneath the terrace lies the Three Treasures Grove,
where the Primordial Beginning inscribed the Cavern Verse.
The Four Dipper Perfected inscribed the *Welcoming Extension Talisman* upon the terrace’s eaves.
Those who bear the celestial tones,
who recite the celestial verses,
may receive the *Welcoming Extension Talisman*.
Upon beholding it,
they wander freely upon the Reverent Florescence Terrace.
This talisman causes one’s neck to bear jeweled radiance,
the body to gleam with jade light,
the *qi* to harmonize with the Three Primes,
and the spirit to penetrate the Great Void.
The tones of the Reverent Florescence Heaven
are wondrously ordered by nature.

---

**Third Scripture of the Radiant Clarity Ancestral Florescence Heaven**
Within the Radiant Clarity Ancestral Florescence Heaven,
there exists a spontaneous script of eight characters,
whose text reads: *Zé luò pú tái lǜ luó dà qiān*.
The Heavenly Perfected Sovereign declared:
These eight characters are the spontaneous script of soaring mystery,
each a *zhang* in breadth, their radiant patterns illuminating the eight directions.
The Primordial Beginning descended to teach,
commanding the transcription of these characters,
the deciphering of their sounds,
and their harmonization into the great Brahmanic esoteric speech of the Ancestral Florescence Heaven—
the *"Boundless Cavern Verse"*—
to be entrusted to the Dao Lord,
who instructs those in the Ancestral Florescence Heaven
with immortal names to deliver the destined.

Radiant Clarity’s marsh-dragon steps,
Luo’s awakening delights the hidden depths.
The bodhisattvas number in the millions,
upon the terrace shine thirty thousand suns.
Green robes flutter in flight,
the net’s blossoms flourish with jade essence.
The Great Net’s primordial supreme hue,
through a thousand kalpas remains in one rank.

The Heavenly Perfected Sovereign declared:
This verse harmonizes the five directions’ soaring mystery *qi*
with the eight characters’ spontaneous tones in the Ancestral Florescence Heaven—
called the *"Boundless Cavern Verse."*
The Ancestral Florescence Heaven lies seven thousand myriad *qi* from the Imperial Reed Heaven.

*"Marsh"* is the name of a mountain in the heavens.
Upon this mountain, myriad dragons arise,
and it bears the Yellow Chamber,
also called the Jade Guest Terrace.

*"Luo’s Awakening"* is the esoteric name of the True Dawn Dao Lord,
who governs within the Yellow Chamber,
abiding through the great kalpa without end,
passing through the Dragon Han to shine anew—
thus delighting the hidden depths.

*"Bodhisattva-Title"* is the hidden name of the Flying Heaven Perfected,
of whom there are countless multitudes,
flying above the Jade Terrace.
The Jade Terrace lies on the southern face of Marsh Mountain,
with thirty thousand suns and moons illuminating its sides.

*"Green Net"* is the esoteric name of the Sun-Moon Heavenly People,
who govern within the Sun-Moon Palace,
ascending the Great Net Heaven’s Brahmanic *qi*,
moving the Six Perfections’ barrier
to accord with Heaven and Earth’s numbers.
When the numbers near their end,
the great kalpas converge,
and once converged,
the heavens’ suns and moons gather at the Jade Terrace.

The divisions of the great thousandfold worlds,
Heaven and Earth transform,
yet the great thousandfold remains as one.
Those who bear the celestial tones,
who recite the celestial verses,
may ride feathered chariots to ascend
the Yellow Chamber’s halls,
the Jade Terrace’s heights.

---

**Fourth Scripture of the Bamboo Grove Imperial Reed Heaven**
Within the Bamboo Grove Imperial Reed Heaven,
there exists a spontaneous script of eight characters,
whose text reads: *Miǎo mǎng jiǔ chǒu sháo yáo yuán zhān*.
The Heavenly Perfected Sovereign declared:
These eight characters are the spontaneous script of soaring mystery,
each a *zhang* in breadth, their radiant patterns illuminating the eight directions.
The Primordial Beginning descended to teach,
commanding the transcription of these characters,
the deciphering of their sounds,
and their harmonization into the great Brahmanic esoteric speech of the Imperial Reed Heaven—
the *"Boundless Cavern Verse"*—
to be entrusted to the Dao Lord,
who instructs those in the Imperial Reed Heaven
with immortal names to deliver the destined.

The Bamboo Grove dimly transforms,
the Dragon Han’s beginning vast and boundless.
Nine paths converge in evil’s origin,
the ugly ghosts’ bodies do not arise.
The *shao*’s brightness roams within the primordial,
the *yao*’s songs scatter the Great Void.
The green net orders the Three *Qi*,
*Zhān* meets the Net Heaven’s thoroughfare.

The Heavenly Perfected Sovereign declared:
This verse harmonizes the five directions’ soaring mystery *qi*
with the eight characters’ spontaneous tones in the Imperial Reed Heaven—
called the *"Boundless Cavern Verse."*
The Imperial Reed Heaven lies six thousand myriad *qi* from the Hall Radiance Heaven.

*"Dimly"* means the Primordial Beginning sank into the Central Heaven of Extended Peace,
inscribing jade characters veiled and unmanifest.
When the Dragon Han inaugurated the kalpa,
its script was vast and boundless.
In that age, when the true Dao was encountered,
men and women alike lived thirty-six thousand years.
When that kalpa reached its end,
another kalpa passed,
and the nine *qi* each produced beasts to harm the wicked.
After that kalpa’s opening,
the nine beasts were renamed the Nine Ugly Ghosts.

The Northern Emperor’s Supreme Perfected governs the Register of Life and Death,
thus establishing the Nine Ugly to assist the Three Officials.
When the numbers reach their limit of eighty-one myriad,
the celestial *qi* reverses the Nine Ugly,
who then transform into the Nine Capital Envoys.

*"Shao"* is the esoteric name of the Divine Empyrean King in the Imperial Reed Heaven.
The Divine Empyrean King is the lord of demon kings,
constantly testing those who study the Dao—
whether their learning is upright or not.

chunks.original_text: 魔王恒作谣歌，以乱其心。 固者，王即保举，得王保举，径升皇笳天中。 缘澶，则南北二斗君之内讳。 人有善功，则列言於南斗，南斗则度三界之难，拔九幽之苦，宣告魔王不敢败之也。 人之行恶，三官列罗於北斗，北斗则告下於魔王，魔王而灭之焉。 魂付九幽之下，充长夜之役，万劫无期，长沦恶缘。 皇笳天中有金华之山，山有五帝之宫，常生五色之云。 日月侠乎左右，飞仙翼其华轩，学成得道皆诣金华之山，受太乙之信，以制神霄之王，灭大魔之试，然后而得乘景输之车，游宴於八方也。 虚明堂曜天音第五 虚明堂曜天中，有自然之书八字，文日云上九都飞生自骞。 天真皇人曰：其八字，飞玄自然之书，字方一丈，文彩焕曜，洞明八方。 元始下教，使撰其字，解其音，合成堂曜天中大梵隐语无量之音，以付道君，使教堂曜天中宿有仙名者，度应得道人也。 虚明云天子，上关玄玄门。 九迭郁陵增，都宫罗玉根。 飞香绕十绝，生炁炼五魂。 自开不死路，骞林歌要言。 天真皇人日：其章以堂曜天中合五方飞玄之炁，以和八字自然之音，曰无量洞章。 堂曜天去端靖天五千万炁。 云上者，飞天神人内讳也。 开龙汉之劫，启赤明之运，敷自然之书，立天地之根，三象既分，而有九层之台，处乎玉京之山，焕乎玄都之上，飞天常散百和之香，流五云之华以灌。 飞天真人台上有太真玉郎，一日三回十绝之旛。 回旛一周，则诸天上朝，绕台三匝，诵咏洞章。 飞生者，南上更生之神也。 学人能诵洞章，声参上宫，诸天称庆，飞生即为开不死之路，流长生之炁，下炼五魂之神，魂神受炼，八景存焉。 八景备守，则共举人身，上升九层之台，游於骞林之中，身佩天书，口诵洞章，二十四年，期得上朝玄都之宫也。 观明端靖天音第六 观明端靖天中，有自然之书八字，文曰那育郁馥摩罗法轮。 天真皇人曰：其八字，飞玄自然之书，字方一丈，文彩焕曜，洞明八方。 元始下教，使撰其字，解其音，合成端靖天中大梵隐语无量之音，以付道君，使教端靖天中宿有仙名者，度应得道人也。 端靖那梵语，育延十转天。 郁默诵灵歌，馥童唱劫年。 摩夷闻稽首，罗密自束身。 法化开灭度，轮转咸归真。 天真皇人曰：其章以端靖天中合五方飞玄之炁，以和八字自然之音，曰无量洞章。 端靖天去玄明恭庆天四千万炁。 那者，天王侍郎之内名，生成四时之炁，梵行虚无之纲，以正端靖天中之分度。 育者，天关之空轮也。 郁馥，中斗灵童之名。 常运育输於太无，回十转以召其天关。 十转则十方大圣上朝玉宫，万神齐真而郁馥唱焉。 摩罗者，天中大魔之内讳也。 郁馥一唱，则魔王束身，天开八方法轮之门，以度下世学者之身。 学知四时之炁，十转之关，则入法轮之门，驾乘八景之舆，升乎玉清之中，上朝紫微之台，位及众真之宾也。 玄明恭庆天音第七 玄明恭庆天中，有自然之书八字，文曰霐持无镜揽姿运容。 天真皇人曰：其八字，飞玄自然之书，字方一丈，文彩焕曜，洞明八方。 元始下教，使撰其字，解其音，合成恭庆天中大梵隐语无量之音，以付道君，使教恭庆天中宿有仙名者，度应得道人也。 玄明霐雿都，持罂注东华，无色玄玄宗，镜飙宛大罗。

The Demon King constantly composes deceptive songs to disturb their minds. Those who remain steadfast—the King will then protect and recommend them, and upon receiving the King’s endorsement, they ascend directly to the Imperial Reed Heaven. *Yuanchan* is the esoteric name of the Lords of the Northern and Southern Dippers. When a person accumulates good deeds, their name is recorded in the Southern Dipper, which then delivers them from the trials of the Three Realms, rescues them from the sufferings of the Nine Dark Prisons, and declares to the Demon King that he dare not harm them. If a person commits evil, the Three Officials report their transgressions to the Northern Dipper, which then informs the Demon King, and the Demon King destroys them. Their souls are consigned to the depths of the Nine Dark Prisons, condemned to eternal servitude in the Long Night, with no end through ten thousand kalpas, forever sunk in wicked karma.

Within the Imperial Reed Heaven stands the Mountain of Golden Splendor, upon which lies the Palace of the Five Emperors, perpetually wreathed in clouds of five colors. The sun and moon flank it on either side, while flying immortals attend its resplendent chariots. Those who complete their studies and attain the Dao all journey to the Mountain of Golden Splendor to receive the token of the Great One, thereby controlling the Divine Empyrean King and extinguishing the trials of the Great Demon. Only then may they ascend the chariot of luminous radiance and roam freely through the Eight Directions.

**Fifth: The Resplendent Void Hall’s Heavenly Sound**
Within the Resplendent Void Hall Heaven, there exists a spontaneous script of eight characters, which reads: *Above the clouds, the Nine Capitals’ flying life arises from the soaring one.*

The Heavenly Perfected of the Celestial Worthy states: These eight characters are the *Flying Mystery Spontaneous Script*, each a *zhang* in size, their radiant patterns illuminating the Eight Directions. The Primordial Beginning descended to teach, instructing the transcription of these characters, the deciphering of their sounds, and the composition of the great esoteric Brahmanic sounds of the Resplendent Void Hall Heaven—sounds of boundless resonance—entrusted to the Dao Lord. He was to teach them to those in the Resplendent Void Hall Heaven whose names were already inscribed among the immortals, so as to deliver those destined for the Dao.

The Cloud Emperor of the Resplendent Void Heaven governs the Gate of Profound Mystery.
Nine-fold layers rise in dense array,
Palaces of the Capitals arrayed with jade roots.
Flying incense encircles the Ten Absolutes,
Vital *qi* refines the Five Souls.
The path of immortality opens of itself,
In the soaring groves, the essential words are sung.

The Heavenly Perfected of the Celestial Worthy states: This hymn harmonizes the *Flying Mystery Qi* of the Five Directions within the Resplendent Void Hall Heaven with the spontaneous sounds of the eight characters, forming the *Boundless Cavern Hymn*.

The Resplendent Void Hall Heaven lies five thousand myriad *qi* from the Upright Serenity Heaven. *Above the clouds* is the esoteric name of the flying divine beings. It opens the Dragon Han kalpa, inaugurates the Crimson Brightness kalpa, unfolds the Spontaneous Script, and establishes the root of Heaven and Earth. Once the Three Images were divided, there arose the Nine-Tiered Terrace, situated upon the Jade Capital Mountain, resplendent above the Mysterious Capital. Flying immortals perpetually scatter the hundred harmonies of incense and pour forth the blossoms of the five clouds in libation.

Upon the terrace of the Flying Immortals stands the Jade Lad of the Great Perfected, who thrice daily revolves the Ten Absolutes’ banner. With each revolution of the banner, the myriad heavens ascend in audience, circling the terrace thrice while chanting the *Cavern Hymn*. *Flying life* is the divine spirit of renewed existence in the Southern Upper Realm. If a practitioner can recite the *Cavern Hymn* with a voice that reaches the Upper Palace, the myriad heavens rejoice, and *Flying Life* then opens the path of immortality, bestowing the *qi* of eternal life to refine the spirits of the Five Souls below. Once the soul-spirits receive refinement, the Eight Radiant Ones are preserved. When the Eight Radiant Ones are fully guarded, they collectively uplift the human body to ascend the Nine-Tiered Terrace, roaming within the soaring groves. Clad in the Heavenly Script and chanting the *Cavern Hymn*, after twenty-four years, they are destined to ascend in audience to the Palace of the Mysterious Capital.

**Sixth: The Observant Brightness Upright Serenity Heavenly Sound**
Within the Observant Brightness Upright Serenity Heaven, there exists a spontaneous script of eight characters, which reads: *Nayū yùfù móluó fǎlún.*

The Heavenly Perfected of the Celestial Worthy states: These eight characters are the *Flying Mystery Spontaneous Script*, each a *zhang* in size, their radiant patterns illuminating the Eight Directions. The Primordial Beginning descended to teach, instructing the transcription of these characters, the deciphering of their sounds, and the composition of the great esoteric Brahmanic sounds of the Upright Serenity Heaven—sounds of boundless resonance—entrusted to the Dao Lord. He was to teach them to those in the Upright Serenity Heaven whose names were already inscribed among the immortals, so as to deliver those destined for the Dao.

Upright Serenity’s Brahmanic sound,
*Nayū* extends the Ten Turning Heavens.
In solemn silence, the sacred hymn is chanted,
The fragrant youths sing of kalpic years.
*Moyi* bows in reverence upon hearing,
*Luomi* binds himself in restraint.
The Dharma unfolds the path of extinction and deliverance,
The Wheel turns, all return to the True.

The Heavenly Perfected of the Celestial Worthy states: This hymn harmonizes the *Flying Mystery Qi* of the Five Directions within the Upright Serenity Heaven with the spontaneous sounds of the eight characters, forming the *Boundless Cavern Hymn*.

The Upright Serenity Heaven lies four thousand myriad *qi* from the Reverent Celebration Heaven of Mysterious Brightness. *Na* is the esoteric name of the Heavenly King’s attendant, who generates the *qi* of the Four Seasons and the guidelines of empty non-action, thereby rectifying the divisions of the Upright Serenity Heaven. *Yū* is the empty wheel of the Heavenly Pass. *Yùfù* are the names of the divine youths of the Central Dipper, who perpetually revolve the *Yū* wheel within the Great Non-Being, invoking the Heavenly Pass through the Ten Turnings. With the Ten Turnings, the great sages of the Ten Directions ascend in audience to the Jade Palace, and the myriad spirits, in perfect unity, sing with *Yùfù*. *Móluó* is the esoteric name of the Great Demon within Heaven. When *Yùfù* sings, the Demon King binds himself, and the Eight Methods’ Dharma Wheel Gate of Heaven opens to deliver the bodies of worldly scholars. Those who comprehend the *qi* of the Four Seasons and the mechanism of the Ten Turnings enter the Dharma Wheel Gate, mount the chariot of the Eight Radiant Ones, ascend into the Jade Clarity, and present themselves in audience at the Purple Tenuity Terrace, attaining the rank of guests among the host of perfected beings.

**Seventh: The Mysterious Brightness Reverent Celebration Heavenly Sound**
Within the Mysterious Brightness Reverent Celebration Heaven, there exists a spontaneous script of eight characters, which reads: *Hóng chí wújìng lǎnzī yùnróng.*

The Heavenly Perfected of the Celestial Worthy states: These eight characters are the *Flying Mystery Spontaneous Script*, each a *zhang* in size, their radiant patterns illuminating the Eight Directions. The Primordial Beginning descended to teach, instructing the transcription of these characters, the deciphering of their sounds, and the composition of the great esoteric Brahmanic sounds of the Reverent Celebration Heaven—sounds of boundless resonance—entrusted to the Dao Lord. He was to teach them to those in the Reverent Celebration Heaven whose names were already inscribed among the immortals, so as to deliver those destined for the Dao.

The Mysterious Brightness’ *hóng* and *diāo* abide in the Capital,
*Holding* the vase, they pour into the Eastern Splendor.
The colorless, the profoundly profound lineage,
The mirroring whirlwind, the vast encompassing *Dàluó*.

chunks.original_text: 揽觉妙自归，姿生岂云多。 运抗不终劫，容纳线太和。 次真皇人曰：其章以恭庆天中合五方飞玄之炁，以和八字自然之音，曰无量洞章。 恭庆天去极瑶天三千万炁。 玄明，则恭庆天之限也。 霐者，天上都监之神内名也。 雿都是紫微宫曲房之号，都监之砷，治曲房之内内，总众真之录黄简之文。 特者，龙厩之名，众龙蟠乎其中，常衔金罂而运东并之华，以灌诸天真人。 华者，月中黄华之精，祆注东井之中，流津无穷之源。 无镜者，则飞天神王游於大罗之上，出无色之光，总生死之籍，开度学道之人，揽姿者，是三界之门，知揽姿之号，则神王拔出九幽之魂，开长夜之府，度於三界之门也。 运容者，则太和玉女，人度三界则运容，导以朱灵之炁，灌以太和之津，形止福德之堂，保劫运而无穷也。 太焕极瑶天音第八 太焕极瑶天中，有自然之书八字，文曰馥朗廓奕神缨自宫。 天真皇人曰：其八字，飞玄自然之书，字方一丈，文彩焕曜，洞明八方。 元始下教，使撰其字，解其音，合成极瑶天中大梵隐语无量之音，以付道君，使教极瑶天宿有仙名者，度应得道人也。 太焕馥上京，朗台秀西灵。 廓为大模范，奕奕神公生。 神为灭度宗，缨络拔长冥。 自入更起门，宫中欢长龄。 天真皇人曰：其章以极瑶天中合五方飞玄之炁以和八字自然之音，曰无量洞章。 极瑶天去孔升天二千万炁。 太焕者，则极瑶天之始元也。 赤明始开，八字焕乎空玄之上，而极瑶之天，於是植焉。 馥朗是天中玉京玄台之别号，西灵真人常诵无量洞章，旋行其上。 廓奕则是天中神公之内名，与元始同生为玄炁之范，开灭度之门，教学仙之人。 君能明八字之音，则神公开长冥之户，身入更起之门，上登玉京之台。 欢乐紫微宫中，有神缨之章，灭度之尸，得神缨之童，一歌无量之章，立得返形於三炼之房，身受自然之炁，欢乐无穷之龄也。 元始天尊告太上道君曰：赤明始开其八天之炁，分度并属南方丹天，天有八字，合六十四音，皆天中大梵隐语无量之音。 行三炁天君之道，当佩其音，诵其章，出入游行，常当叩齿三通。 思朱雀凤凰翻翔其前，绛云三重，覆匝身形，密咒曰： 三炁徘徊，灵凤来飞。 玉音八字，焕烂紫微。 日吉大庆，我道洞开。 朱丹哺饴，仰嗡灵晖。 身生水火，绛帔羽衣。 登空玄步，足践凤梯。 周旋八天，七祖相随。 毕，引炁三咽止，行之三年，八天各以太丹玉女、太阳玉童各八人，侍卫身形，降致朱丹，三炁之精，返白留容，万劫不倾，七祖同升，上入福堂，返胎王家，即得更生。 其法弘普，广度无穷，勤为用心，谛受勿忘，道君稽首，奉受命旨。 太上洞玄灵宝诸天内音自然玉字卷之三 #1#2「以」字据上下文例补。 太上洞玄灵宝诸天内音自然玉字卷之四 元载孔升天音第－ 元载孔升天中，有自然之书八字，文曰刃利禅猷婆泥咎通。 天真皇人曰：其八字，飞玄自然之书，字方一丈，文彩焕曜，洞明八方。 元始下教，使撰其字，解其音，合成孔升天中大梵隐语无量之音，以付道君，使教孔升天中宿有仙名者，度应得道人也。 元载忉悦境，利浮爓洞阳。 禅享苦生界，猷命化南宫。 婆耶有炼池，泥津饰雕容。 咎丑遏生源，通勃肆鼓洋。

Grasping Awareness returns to the wondrous of itself,
How could the arising of forms be called excessive?
The revolving resistance does not endure through kalpas,
The encompassing of appearances holds the thread of Great Harmony.

The Perfected Sovereign of the Next Rank said: This *zhang* combines the flying mysterious *qi* of the Five Directions within the Reverent Celebration Heaven with the spontaneous sounds of the eight characters, called the *Boundless Cavern Zhang*. The Reverent Celebration Heaven lies thirty million *qi* from the Ultimate Jade Heaven. *Xuánmíng* marks the boundary of the Reverent Celebration Heaven. *Hóng* is the inner name of the celestial capital’s supervisory deity. *Diāo Capital* is the designation of the Purple Tenuity Palace’s winding chambers, where the supervisor’s altar governs the innermost recesses, collating the registers of all perfected beings and the texts inscribed on yellow slips. *Té* is the name of the dragon stables, where all dragons coil within, perpetually holding golden vases to convey the splendor of the Eastern Well, irrigating the perfected of all heavens. *Huá* is the essence of the moon’s yellow blossom, its numinous infusion flowing into the Eastern Well as an inexhaustible source of fluid. *Wújìng* refers to the flying divine kings who roam above the *Dàluó*, emitting colorless light, overseeing the registers of life and death, and delivering those who study the Dao. *Lǎnzī* is the gate of the Three Realms; knowing the name *Lǎnzī*, the divine kings extract souls from the Nine Glooms, unlock the long night’s repository, and deliver them through the gate of the Three Realms. *Yùnróng* refers to the Jade Maiden of Great Harmony; when one is delivered through the Three Realms, she revolves their appearance, guiding them with vermilion numinous *qi* and irrigating them with the fluid of Great Harmony. Their form abides in the Hall of Blessings and Virtue, preserving kalpas and kalpas without end.

---

The *Supremely Radiant Ultimate Jade Heaven* Eighth
Within the Supremely Radiant Ultimate Jade Heaven, there are eight characters of spontaneous script, which read: *Fùlǎng Kuòyì Shényīng Zìgōng*. The Perfected Sovereign of Heavenly Truth said: These eight characters are the *Flying Mystery Spontaneous Script*, each a *zhang* in size, their radiant patterns illuminating the Eight Directions. The Primordial Beginning descended to teach, instructing the transcription of these characters, the deciphering of their sounds, and the composition of the great esoteric Brahmanic sounds of the Ultimate Jade Heaven—sounds of boundless resonance—entrusted to the Dao Lord. He was to teach them to those in the Ultimate Jade Heaven whose names were already inscribed among the immortals, so as to deliver those destined for the Dao.

The supremely radiant *Fù* ascends the capital,
The luminous terrace graces the Western Numinous.
*Kuò* serves as the great model,
The resplendent divine lord is born.
The divine is the lineage of extinction and deliverance,
The garlanded cords extract from the long darkness.
Entering anew, they rise through the gate,
Within the palace, joy endures for eternal ages.

The Perfected Sovereign of Heavenly Truth said: This *zhang* combines the flying mysterious *qi* of the Five Directions within the Ultimate Jade Heaven with the spontaneous sounds of the eight characters, called the *Boundless Cavern Zhang*. The Ultimate Jade Heaven lies twenty million *qi* from the *Kǒngshēng* Heaven. *Tàihuàn* marks the primordial origin of the Ultimate Jade Heaven. When the Crimson Clarity first opened, the eight characters blazed above the empty mystery, and thus the Ultimate Jade Heaven was established. *Fùlǎng* is another name for the Jade Capital’s Mysterious Terrace within this heaven, where the Western Numinous Perfected constantly recite the *Boundless Cavern Zhang*, circling above it. *Kuòyì* is the inner name of the divine lord of this heaven, who was born together with the Primordial Beginning as the model of mysterious *qi*, opening the gate of extinction and deliverance to instruct those who study immortality. If one can clarify the sounds of the eight characters, the divine lord will open the door of the long darkness, and the body will enter the gate of renewal, ascending to the terrace of the Jade Capital. Rejoicing in the Purple Tenuity Palace, there is the *Divine Garland Zhang*; the corpse of extinction and deliverance, having obtained the divine garlanded youths, sings the *Boundless Zhang* once and immediately regains form within the Three Refinements’ chamber, receiving the spontaneous *qi* and rejoicing in boundless ages.

The Primordial Heavenly Worthy addressed the Most High Dao Lord, saying: When the Crimson Clarity first opened, the *qi* of the Eight Heavens was apportioned and assigned to the Southern Cinnabar Heaven. Each heaven possesses eight characters, combining into sixty-four sounds, all of which are the great esoteric Brahmanic sounds of boundless resonance within the heavens. Those who practice the Way of the Three *Qi* Heavenly Lords should wear these sounds, recite this *zhang*, and when entering or exiting, traveling or wandering, always knock their teeth three times. Visualize the Vermilion Phoenix soaring before them, with crimson clouds in three layers enveloping their form. The secret incantation reads:

The Three *Qi* meander,
The numinous phoenix comes flying.
The eight characters of jade sound
Blaze resplendent in the Purple Tenuity.
Auspicious day, great celebration,
My Dao opens boundlessly.
Vermilion cinnabar, sweet as nectar,
I gaze upward to the numinous radiance.
Body born of water and fire,
Crimson mantle and feathered robe.
Ascending the empty mystery’s steps,
Feet tread the phoenix’s ladder.
Circling the Eight Heavens,
Seven ancestors follow.
Conclude by drawing in *qi* and swallowing three times. Practicing this for three years, the Eight Heavens will each send eight Jade Maidens of Great Cinnabar and eight Jade Lads of Great Yang to attend and guard one’s form, bestowing vermilion cinnabar, the essence of the Three *Qi*, reversing whiteness to preserve appearance, enduring ten thousand kalpas without decline. Seven ancestors ascend together, entering the Hall of Blessings, returning to the womb of the royal family, and immediately attaining rebirth. This method is vast and universal, delivering boundlessly. Diligently apply the mind, receive it earnestly, and never forget. The Dao Lord bowed his head and reverently received the decree.

---

The *Primordial Qi Kǒngshēng Heaven* First
Within the Primordial Qi *Kǒngshēng* Heaven, there are eight characters of spontaneous script, which read: *Rènlì Chányóu Póní Jiùtōng*. The Perfected Sovereign of Heavenly Truth said: These eight characters are the *Flying Mystery Spontaneous Script*, each a *zhang* in size, their radiant patterns illuminating the Eight Directions. The Primordial Beginning descended to teach, instructing the transcription of these characters, the deciphering of their sounds, and the composition of the great esoteric Brahmanic sounds of the *Kǒngshēng* Heaven—sounds of boundless resonance—entrusted to the Dao Lord. He was to teach them to those in the *Kǒngshēng* Heaven whose names were already inscribed among the immortals, so as to deliver those destined for the Dao.

The primordial *Yuán* delights in joyous realms,
*Lì* floats upon the flaming Yang cavern.
*Chán* offers in the realm of suffering’s arising,
*Yóu* commands transformation in the Southern Palace.
*Pó* possesses refining pools,
*Ní*’s fluid adorns carved appearances.
*Jiù* and *chǒu* obstruct the source of life,
*Tōng* and *bó* wildly drum the vast expanse.

The Mysterious Brightness’ *hóng* and *diāo* abide in the Capital,

chunks.original_text: 天真皇人曰：其章以孔升天中合五方飞玄之炁，以和八字自然之音，曰无量洞章。 孔升天去皇崖天九百万炁。 元者，元之始，载梵行之炁以成孔升之天。 刃利者，南无际世界之号，禅是刃利之国。 生存其国，则为苦生无善之根，其界上有洞阳之宫，浮爓为流火之庭，荧饰光芒。 灵文既明，刃利国土改为福德之堂，苦生之魂皆得度入洞阳之宫。 猷是南上好生君内名也。 婆泥，则炼池之灵童也。 苦生之人，得度洞阳之宫，皆诣炼池受灵童之炼，而更生福德之世。 咎通，刃利世界之魔神，常遏人生生之路。 人知好生君名，诣灵童而受炼，魔神即奉之焉。 学得八字之音，则刃利之境，无极灵官侍卫其身，而造南霍，则仙人伺迎，三年必能策丹霄之轮，上升三炁之天也。 太安皇崖天音第二 太安皇崖天中，有自然之书八字，文曰宛薮涤色太眇之堂。 天真皇人曰：其八字，飞玄自然之书，字方一丈，文彩焕曜，洞明八方。 元始下教，使撰其字，解其音，合成皇崖天中大梵隐语无量之音，以付道君，使教皇崖天中宿有仙名者，度应得道人也。 太安宛太漠，薮遥但赤明。 涤荡尘滓氛，色界大罗青。 太漠导真科，眇邈空洞经。 之历飞天诚，堂堂更化生。 天真皇人曰：其章以皇崖天中合五方飞玄之炁，以和八字自然之音，曰：无量洞章。 皇崖天去极风天八百万炁。 太者，虚之名，以安皇崖之天。 天有帝王，监名宛薮，而开太漠之径，以明八字之文。 明道既彰，大罗之上郁然澄清。 涤色者，是色界上飞天真人也。 常乘景云之车，驾九色之龙，游乎三界之上，出入玉清之中，荡除尘滓之炁，开度善根之人。 太眇为空洞之化，结自然之章，理明道以教导，劝拯度於万生。 学见八字之音，洞知天中之名，飞天降致景云之车，载兆上升，化生之台也。 显定极风天音第三 显定极风天中，有自然之书八字，文曰流罗梵萌景蔚萧嵎。 天真皇人曰：其八字，飞玄自然之书，字方一丈，文彩焕曜，洞明八方。 元始下教，使撰其字，解其音，合成极风天中大梵隐语无量之音，以付道君，使教皇崖天中宿有仙名者，度应得道人也。 极风流元景，罗晖曜九玄。 梵纲回天劫，萌邃固玉根。 景行历长夜，蔚秀落华年。 萧仞空中立，嵎上对清宾。 天真皇人曰：其章以极风天中合五方飞玄之炁，以和八字自然之音，曰无量洞章。 极风天去孝芒天七百万炁。 极风，洞极之炁，纲维八员而成天也。 天立而八字明焉。 流者，天王之内名。 处乎紫霄之上，游观玉京之山。 罗者，月女之讳。 流晖极风之天，洞照九玄之员。 梵则飞天之人，萌则元始之神，飞天则回九天之关，大神则固极风之根。 景皇四上真人萧蔚，亦是景霄仙人，并治玉京之台，常乘三色之云，历校长夜之中，料生死於简籍，开度善根之魂，万劫长对，并系之焉。 若修灵文於洞章，则仰披九玄之房，乃得驾三色之云，上升景皇之草，拔九幽之魂，死骸更生法轮之门。 始皇孝芒天音第四 始皇孝芒天中，有自然之书八字，文曰易邈无寂宛首少都。 天真皇人曰：其八字，飞玄自然之书，字方一丈，文彩焕曜，洞明八方。 元始下教，使撰其字，解其音，合成孝芒天中大梵隐语无量之音，以付道君，使教孝芒天中宿有仙名者，度应得道人也。
